title: Trump‚Äôs Crypto Fortune Grows with $2B in Bitcoin Holdings
body: Trump Media and Technology Group revealed on Monday that it has built up about $2 billion worth of bitcoin and crypto-related assets , making up nearly two-thirds of its liquid funds. The news gave the company's stock a quick lift, jumping 9% at the market open before settling up about 4% later in the day. Trump‚Äôs personal stake in the company‚Äîtraded under the ticker DJT‚Äîis now valued at roughly $2.3 billion , boosting his wealth significantly while he's still in office. This continues a trend that‚Äôs seen Trump fully embrace digital assets, with a recent Forbes report showing that crypto now makes up most of his paper wealth . Once skeptical of digital currencies, Trump has now positioned himself as a strong crypto advocate. He‚Äôs signed an executive order to create a national bitcoin reserve, named a ‚Äúcrypto czar,‚Äù and urged Congress to push through several crypto bills. One of those, the GENIUS Act, was signed into law just last week. Beyond Trump Media, he‚Äôs also earning millions from other crypto ventures. One standout is World Liberty Financial‚Äîa decentralized finance project where the Trump family has a large stake. According to Reuters, it has generated about $500 million since its September launch , largely benefiting a trust controlled by Trump Jr. Though Trump doesn‚Äôt directly manage the trust, he remains its sole beneficiary. Critics say this setup raises ethical concerns, warning that Trump‚Äôs deep involvement in crypto could influence his political decisions. Advocacy groups and lawmakers have raised red flags about the potential for conflicts of interest. Trump Media, once known mainly for its Truth Social app, has now shifted its focus to financial services and crypto. Earlier this year, the company launched Truth.Fi, secured hundreds of millions in crypto-linked investments, partnered with Crypto.com, and raised over $2.3 billion to fund its growing bitcoin treasury. The announcement came shortly after bitcoin hit a record high, topping $120,000. Trump Media‚Äôs CEO Devin Nunes said the move is part of a broader strategy to ensure the company‚Äôs financial independence and support the upcoming launch of a utility token tied to Truth Social.

title: Explosive South Korea Crypto Volume: Retail Investors Fuel Astonishing Surge
body: BitcoinWorld Explosive South Korea Crypto Volume: Retail Investors Fuel Astonishing Surge The cryptocurrency market is a dynamic arena, constantly shaped by various forces. Recently, a significant shift has been observed in the Asian market, particularly concerning the South Korea crypto volume . This dramatic increase has caught the attention of market analysts and investors worldwide, signaling potential trends and opportunities. Unpacking the Astonishing Surge in South Korea Crypto Volume In a recent revelation shared on X, the prominent crypto services provider Matrixport shed light on a remarkable development in the South Korean crypto landscape. Over the past two weeks, the total crypto trading volume in the nation experienced an astonishing leap, surging from a mere $1 billion to an impressive $6 billion. This six-fold increase underscores a robust resurgence of interest and activity within the market. What makes this surge even more compelling is the primary driving force behind it: the strong engagement of retail investors. Unlike institutional players, retail investors often react swiftly to market sentiment and news, injecting a unique dynamism into trading volumes. Matrixport‚Äôs report highlights that this retail-led momentum is a key characteristic of the current market upswing in Korea. Simultaneously with the escalating South Korea crypto volume , Bitcoin‚Äôs open interest has also soared by approximately $6 billion. Open interest, in simple terms, represents the total number of outstanding derivative contracts, such as futures or options, that have not yet been settled. A significant increase in open interest, especially when coupled with rising prices, often indicates new money flowing into the market and a strong conviction among traders. Adding another layer to this bullish narrative is the rise in the annualized funding rate. The funding rate is a periodic payment made to long or short traders based on the difference between perpetual contract prices and spot prices. A positive and increasing funding rate suggests that long positions are dominant and willing to pay short positions to keep their trades open, hinting at the growth of aggressive leveraged long positions in the market. Matrixport specifically highlighted this, indicating a speculative fervor among traders betting on continued price appreciation. Why Are Retail Investors Driving This Korean Crypto Boom? South Korea has long been recognized as a hotbed for cryptocurrency adoption, with a tech-savvy population and a high degree of financial literacy. Several factors contribute to why retail investors are particularly dominant in driving the current South Korea crypto volume boom: High Digital Adoption: South Korea boasts one of the highest internet and smartphone penetration rates globally, making digital asset trading highly accessible to the general public. Cultural Propensity for Investment: Historically, South Koreans have shown a strong inclination towards speculative investments, from traditional stocks to real estate. Cryptocurrencies fit well into this cultural appetite for high-growth assets. Accessible Trading Platforms: Local exchanges like Upbit and Bithumb offer user-friendly interfaces and robust infrastructure, catering effectively to retail traders. Past Market Experiences: Many Korean retail investors have experienced significant gains (and losses) in previous crypto bull runs, fostering a resilient and often aggressive trading mentality. The ‚ÄòKimchi Premium‚Äô phenomenon, where Bitcoin trades at a higher price on Korean exchanges compared to global averages, further illustrates the unique local demand. Social Media Influence: Crypto communities and influencers on platforms like KakaoTalk and Telegram play a significant role in disseminating information and shaping retail sentiment. This confluence of factors creates a fertile ground for retail-led surges, making the South Korea crypto volume a crucial metric to watch for global market participants. Understanding Leveraged Longs: Risks and Rewards in South Korea‚Äôs Market The mention of ‚Äòaggressive leveraged long positions‚Äô by Matrixport is a critical detail. Leverage allows traders to open positions larger than their initial capital by borrowing funds. While this can amplify profits during an uptrend, it also significantly magnifies potential losses. Here‚Äôs a closer look at what this implies for the South Korea crypto volume : Amplified Market Movements: A high concentration of leveraged long positions can lead to exaggerated price movements. If prices move favorably, profits are compounded; however, a sudden downturn can trigger widespread liquidations. Increased Volatility: The presence of significant leverage inherently increases market volatility. Large liquidation events, often referred to as ‚Äòlong squeezes,‚Äô can cause rapid price drops as automated systems close out positions to prevent further losses. Funding Rate Dynamics: As mentioned, a rising annualized funding rate indicates a strong demand for long positions. This means long position holders are paying short position holders to maintain their leveraged bets. While profitable for short sellers, it reflects a strong bullish bias among the majority of traders. Risk of Liquidation Cascades: Should the market experience a sharp correction, these aggressive leveraged positions are vulnerable to liquidation. A cascade of liquidations can exacerbate the downturn, creating a domino effect that impacts overall market stability. While the current sentiment is overwhelmingly bullish, the inherent risks associated with high leverage warrant caution, reminding investors of the importance of risk management. What‚Äôs Next for South Korea Crypto Volume? Matrixport‚Äôs Outlook and Key Catalysts Despite the potential for short-term volatility, Matrixport maintains an optimistic outlook, expecting the overall uptrend in South Korea crypto volume and market activity to continue. This projection is underpinned by several key catalysts on the horizon: U.S. FOMC Meeting: The upcoming U.S. Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting is a significant event. Decisions regarding interest rates and monetary policy can have a profound impact on global financial markets, including cryptocurrencies. A dovish stance (indicating lower interest rates or a pause in rate hikes) typically bodes well for risk assets like crypto. Bitcoin Halving: The highly anticipated Bitcoin halving event, scheduled for 2024, historically precedes significant bull runs. This supply-side shock reduces the rate at which new Bitcoin enters circulation, often leading to price appreciation if demand remains constant or increases. Spot Bitcoin ETF Approvals: The potential approval of a spot Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF) in major markets like the U.S. could open the floodgates for institutional and mainstream retail investment, significantly boosting liquidity and market cap. Global Economic Recovery: Broader macroeconomic improvements, such as receding inflation and stable economic growth, often create a more favorable environment for speculative assets. Regulatory Clarity: As governments worldwide work towards clearer regulatory frameworks for digital assets, increased clarity can reduce uncertainty and attract more traditional investors. These potential catalysts suggest that the current surge in South Korea crypto volume might be an early indicator of a broader market uptrend, with retail investors in Korea leading the charge. Navigating the Waves: Actionable Insights for Crypto Enthusiasts The surge in South Korea crypto volume offers valuable insights for crypto enthusiasts and investors globally. While specific market conditions in Korea may differ, the underlying trends can be indicative of broader market sentiment: Monitor Retail Sentiment: The Korean market often serves as a bellwether for retail sentiment. Observing trends there can provide early signals for global retail participation. Understand Leverage: For those considering leveraged trading, it‚Äôs crucial to fully understand the risks involved. While it can amplify gains, it can also lead to rapid losses. Implement strict risk management strategies, including stop-loss orders. Stay Informed on Macro Events: Events like FOMC meetings are not isolated to traditional finance. Their ripple effects are felt across all asset classes, including crypto. Staying updated on global economic news is vital. Diversify and Research: While Bitcoin and major altcoins may be driving the current surge, always conduct thorough research and consider diversifying your portfolio to mitigate risk. Long-Term Perspective: Despite short-term volatility, the long-term outlook for crypto, supported by technological advancements and increasing adoption, remains strong. Focus on fundamental value and project utility. In conclusion, the dramatic increase in South Korea crypto volume , predominantly fueled by aggressive retail investor engagement and leveraged long positions, paints a vibrant picture of renewed enthusiasm in the crypto market. While the potential for short-term volatility remains, Matrixport‚Äôs optimistic outlook, bolstered by upcoming catalysts like the U.S. FOMC meeting, suggests that this could be the beginning of a sustained uptrend. As the crypto landscape continues to evolve, understanding these localized surges and their broader implications will be crucial for navigating the exciting journey ahead. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is the significance of the surge in South Korea‚Äôs crypto volume? The surge in South Korea crypto volume from $1 billion to $6 billion signifies a strong return of investor interest and capital into the cryptocurrency market. It‚Äôs particularly notable because it‚Äôs primarily driven by retail investors, often seen as a bellwether for broader market sentiment and potential future trends. How do retail investors contribute to this surge? Retail investors, characterized by their quick response to market sentiment and accessibility to trading platforms, are the primary drivers. Their collective trading activity, often influenced by social media and community discussions, can significantly amplify trading volumes and market movements, as seen with the South Korea crypto volume . What are ‚Äúaggressive leveraged long positions‚Äù? Aggressive leveraged long positions involve traders borrowing funds to bet on an asset‚Äôs price increase. While this amplifies potential profits, it also significantly increases the risk of liquidation if the market moves unfavorably. Matrixport‚Äôs report suggests a high concentration of such positions in the Korean market, indicating strong bullish conviction. What is the ‚Äúannualized funding rate‚Äù and why is it important? The annualized funding rate is a payment mechanism in perpetual futures contracts designed to keep the contract price close to the spot price. A positive and increasing funding rate indicates that long position holders are paying short position holders, suggesting a strong demand for long positions and an overall bullish market sentiment, reflecting the dynamics of the South Korea crypto volume . What potential catalysts could further influence the market? Key upcoming catalysts include the U.S. FOMC meeting, which can influence global financial markets; the Bitcoin halving, which historically impacts supply; and potential approvals of spot Bitcoin ETFs, which could bring significant institutional investment. These events are expected to sustain or even accelerate the current market uptrend. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to spread awareness about the exciting developments in the South Korea crypto volume and beyond! To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. title: Ripple CTO Indirectly Tells XRP Holders Not to Sell at This Price Range
body: A recent post from Ripple‚Äôs Chief Technology Officer, David Schwartz, has triggered a wave of speculation among XRP holders. While his comment appeared lighthearted on the surface, prominent voices in the community are interpreting it as a subtle signal regarding XRP‚Äôs price trajectory. Schwartz shared a brief exchange with his wife: ‚ÄúMy Wife: Where were you between five and six? Me: Umm‚Ä¶ kindergarten.‚Äù Though the post is seemingly trivial, it quickly gained traction as traders began to connect the numbers ‚Äúfive and six‚Äù to potential XRP price levels. Community Interprets a Hidden Message JackTheRippler (@RippleXrpie), a widely followed XRP community figure, suggested that Schwartz‚Äôs words could carry an indirect message. He wrote that the CTO was ‚Äútelling you indirectly not to sell XRP between 5 and 6 dollars.‚Äù CTO of @Ripple ‚Äì David Schwartz is telling you indirectly not to sell #XRP between 5 and 6 dollars. pic.twitter.com/1f6HaQN5gX ‚Äî JackTheRippler ¬© (@RippleXrpie) July 20, 2025 This interpretation resonated with many holders, as it comes just days after Schwartz clarified the discrepancy about XRP‚Äôs all-time high , showing the asset has reached new heights. Community responses reflect mixed reactions to the idea. Some showed confidence in the asset‚Äôs future, with one user questioning why anyone would consider selling at $5 or $6, calling it a poor decision given XRP‚Äôs perceived long-term potential. Meanwhile, Dave Portnoy, the founder of Barstool Sports, recently made a similar mistake , selling his XRP shortly before it reached a new all-time high. However, those who see XRP‚Äôs true value believe that the $5 to $6 range is too low to sell, and some prominent figures in the community have set targets as high as $333 . We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Another added that while the connection might be coincidental, it was worth noting if XRP approached that price range. Both comments underline a shared belief that such price points might not represent XRP‚Äôs ultimate value ceiling. However, not everyone shares this belief, as one commenter explained that Schwartz was just sharing a funny joke. XRP Holders Watching Closely The timing of the post adds another layer of intrigue. Analysts are bullish on XRP‚Äôs immediate future, as they see the current all-time high of $3.65 as the beginning of a massive move and anticipate double-digit targets. With XRP recently making significant moves in the market, any comment referencing numbers in the mid-single digits is bound to draw attention from the community, as they are eager for growth. title: UAE yacht and shipyard company now accepting crypto payments
body: From UAE Judiciary bodies, to airlines, taxi service providers, gas stations and in the near future real estate investment, UAE governmental entities and businesses are adopting crypto payments. This why it is not surprising to see Gulf Craft, a leading global builder of luxiry yachts and leisure boats as well as superyacht shipyard announce that it too will be accepting crypto payments in UAE and Bahrain. As per the press release, Gulf Craft is now accepting regulated crypto payment solutions for yacht and leisure craft purchases, service and refit works. The company is working with Bahrain licensed fintech provider ARP Pay, to convert stablecoins such as USDT and USDC into AED or USD currency. Mohamed Hussein Alshaali, Chairman of Gulf Craft noted that by integrating ARP Pay, the company is not only meeting client preferences but is also strengthening the UAE reputation for manufacturing and financial innovation. He stated, ‚ÄúThe UAE was built on maritime trade and early adoption of new ideas. Embracing regulated digital payments is a natural next step.‚Äù A recent pilot allowed a part of a yacht purchase price to be settled in cryptocurrency, cutting transaction costs and improving client satisfaction among international buyers. Erwin Bamps, Group CEO of Gulf Crypto noted that crypto payment options keep the ahead of the curve and allows them to tap into a growing segment of crypto holders who prefer paying with digital assets. He explained, ‚ÄúWhether a client is taking delivery of a Majesty or Nomad yacht or purchasing any boat or power catamaran across our Oryx or SilverCAT ranges, they can now transact through a channel that is fast, transparent and fully compliant.‚Äù UAE Judicial Department recently accepting crypto for payments Continuing on the momentum of adopting stablecoins and crypto as a payment method in the UAE, the Abu Dhabi Judicial Department (ADJD) partnered as well with Al Maryah Bank (MBANK) to introduce the use of digital currency for the payment of judicial and legal service fees. ADJD would be the first governmental entity in the Middle East to accept an AED stablecoin, AE Coin, for payment for court related transactions. AE Coin was the first AED stablecoin to be licensed in the UAE. Already, Dubai Department of Finance (DOF) , the governmental entity responsible for budget and its execution signed an MOU (Memorandum of Understanding) with UAE regulated Crypto.com to allow crypto payments for governmental fees. title: Africa Money & DeFi Summit West Africa Returns to Accra as Fintech, Web3, and Stablecoins Reshape Financial Systems
body: BitcoinWorld Africa Money & DeFi Summit West Africa Returns to Accra as Fintech, Web3, and Stablecoins Reshape Financial Systems Accra, Ghana ‚Äì July 23, 2025 The third edition of Africa Money & DeFi Summit West Africa returns to Ghana on September 24‚Äì25, 2025 , bringing together over 500 leaders across fintech, Web3, and decentralized finance. As West Africa continues its rise as a digital finance trailblazer, this high-impact summit builds on its reputation as a catalyst for driving business growth, investment, and partnerships across the region. The Summit will explore how modern payments and cross-border trade are unlocking new economic opportunities across Africa, while digital services and lending platforms expand financial inclusion. Stablecoins and Web3 are redefining value exchange and ownership, with embedded finance making financial tools more accessible than ever. Sessions will also tackle regulation and policy, KYC and digital identity for secure digital ecosystems, and examine how fintech and AI are driving smarter, more personalized financial solutions. With Nigeria leading global stablecoin adoption (25.9 million users, 11.9% penetration) and Ghana poised to enact digital asset regulations by September 2025, with the Central Bank of Ghana in attendance, West Africa is clearly at the forefront of financial transformation. According to Yellow Card‚Äôs 2025 Report , Sub-Saharan Africa boasts the world‚Äôs highest stablecoin adoption rate (9.3%), with Nigeria ranking second globally in overall digital asset usage. Andrew Fassnidge , Director of Africa Money & DeFi Summit, comments: ‚ÄúAfrica‚Äôs financial landscape is evolving rapidly. Stablecoins now support payroll, cross-border transfers, and business operations ‚Äì driving real commercial momentum. With mobile-based stablecoin transfers up 61% and 43% of digital asset transactions involving stablecoins, adoption is accelerating. Fintech innovation is at the heart of this shift, spanning embedded finance, lending platforms, digital identity, Web3, mobile money, and digital commerce. This summit brings together the builders, investors, and platforms turning emerging technologies into scalable business and investment opportunities.‚Äù Applications are now open for the Investment Showcase , spotlighting investment-ready African ventures across fintech, blockchain, payments, Web3, and DeFi. Selected startups will pitch live to investors and ecosystem leaders, with the potential to secure funding and strategic partnerships. Applications close August 13, 2025 . Join industry leaders in Accra on September 24-25, 2025. Early bird tickets are available now at https://africamoneydefisummit.com About Africa Money and DeFi Summit West Africa Africa Money & DeFi Summit West Africa (AMDSGH), curated by the team behind the Africa Tech Summit Series, is a leading technology conference that provides valuable insights and networking opportunities for the Pan-African Fintech, Decentralised Finance (DeFi) & Web3 ecosystem. Hosted in Accra, Ghana, AMDSGH brings together fintech leaders, Mobile Network Operators (MNOs), banks, international investors, entrepreneurs, government representatives, trade bodies, media, and leading ventures to drive investment and foster business collaborations within the African Fintech and DeFi ecosystem. https://africamoneydefisummit.com For more information: Email: register@africatechsummit.com Past event photos: Here Past videos: Here Social: Twitter: AMDS: @AfricaMoneyDefi LinkedIn: Africa Money & DeFi Summit Instagram: ATS Instagram Facebook: Africa Tech Summit HQ Media Contact: Emily Okello emily@africatechsummit.com This post Africa Money & DeFi Summit West Africa Returns to Accra as Fintech, Web3, and Stablecoins Reshape Financial Systems first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Keshav Aggarwal

title: MBG Token Set to Launch on Gate.io and MEXC Following Pre-Sale Success
body: MultiBank Group has announced that its $MBG token was officially listed on both Gate.io and MEXC on July 22, the same day as the project's Token Generation Event (TGE). The token is also available for trading on MultiBank.io and Uniswap, offering users both centralized and decentralized access from day one. The dual listing comes on the heels of a successful two-round pre-sale in which the Group sold a total of 10 million tokens at $0.35 each, raising a total of $3.5 million. The sale attracted significant attention across both retail and institutional circles, reflecting the market‚Äôs growing interest in utility tokens connected to real-world asset (RWA) strategies. $MBG is positioned as a utility token within MultiBank‚Äôs broader Web3 ecosystem. It will be used for trading fee discounts, staking, loyalty tiers, and early access to platform features. A key component of its roadmap involves supporting RWA tokenization, starting with a $3 billion luxury real estate initiative in Dubai in collaboration with MAG and Mavryk. Naser Taher, Chairman and Founder of MultiBank Group said, ‚ÄúWith $MBG, we‚Äôre introducing a utility token built to deliver real-world value, transparency, and long-term trust. This is a major step in our mission to merge traditional finance with blockchain on a global scale‚Äù. MultiBank Group brings regulatory legitimacy to the launch, operating in over 17 jurisdictions and managing more than $29 billion in assets. This gives $MBG an unusual level of credibility in a token space often characterized by anonymous teams and speculative roadmaps. To support long-term token value, the Group has committed to a $440 million buyback-and-burn program. Revenue from trading operations will be used to reduce the circulating supply of $MBG over time, a deflationary strategy designed to align token incentives with actual usage. Listing on exchanges like Gate.io and MEXC expands MBG‚Äôs global accessibility. Gate.io‚Äôs regulatory presence in Europe and MEXC‚Äôs broad reach across Asia and Latin America ensure that the token is immediately tradable across diverse markets. Soon after the TGE, MultiBank will begin rolling out utility integrations. These include staking pools, loyalty rewards, and access to early-stage trading opportunities. The MBG ecosystem will also be supported by a hybrid crypto-tradfi exchange platform, known as MultiBank Exchange (MEX), that is currently under development. Designed to connect Institutional clients with TradFi and digital assets , MEX aims to offer an integrated trading environment once launched. As interest in RWA tokenization continues to grow, MBG‚Äôs listing strategy appears aimed at positioning the token as more than a one-off event. By focusing on exchange accessibility, platform integration, and real-world backing, the Group is making a case for MBG as a durable part of the evolving Web3 financial stack. Additional details regarding cross-chain functionality, staking timelines, and upcoming RWA partnerships are expected to be announced in the coming weeks. title: Unstoppable Ethereum Unstaking Surge: What 620K ETH Means for the Market
body: BitcoinWorld Unstoppable Ethereum Unstaking Surge: What 620K ETH Means for the Market The world of cryptocurrency is rarely static, and recent on-chain data reveals a significant shift in the Ethereum ecosystem that has caught the attention of investors and analysts alike. A staggering volume of nearly 620,000 ETH is currently queued for withdrawal from staking, marking a substantial increase that prompts crucial questions about market dynamics and investor sentiment. This massive Ethereum unstaking wave, highlighted by on-chain analyst @ai_9684xtpa, is not just a number; it represents hundreds of millions of dollars in potential liquidity entering the market, with implications for the price of ETH and the broader decentralized finance (DeFi) landscape. Understanding this phenomenon is key to navigating the evolving crypto market. What‚Äôs Behind the Ethereum Unstaking Surge? For those new to the concept, Ethereum staking involves locking up ETH to support the network‚Äôs security and operations, earning rewards in return. The ability to unstake, or withdraw staked ETH, was enabled with the Shapella upgrade in April 2023. While this feature brought much-needed flexibility and reduced some of the perceived risks of staking, it also introduced the possibility of large-scale withdrawals. The current surge in the Ethereum unstaking queue can be attributed to several factors: Profit Taking: With ETH experiencing significant price appreciation over recent periods, some long-term stakers may be looking to realize profits. The ability to unstake provides the liquidity to do so. Yield Optimization: Stakers might be re-evaluating their capital allocation, seeking higher yields or different investment opportunities in other protocols or chains that offer more attractive returns compared to current Ethereum staking rewards. Market Uncertainty: General market volatility or specific concerns about regulatory developments, economic shifts, or even the performance of other assets could prompt some large holders to reduce their exposure to staked ETH and move into more liquid or less volatile assets. Operational Adjustments: Large institutional players or exchanges might be rebalancing their portfolios, undergoing internal audits, or adjusting their risk management strategies, leading to significant withdrawals. The sheer volume of 620,000 ETH represents a substantial portion of the total staked ETH, and its movement is closely watched by market participants. Who‚Äôs Unstaking? A Closer Look at Major Ethereum Unstaking Withdrawals The data provides fascinating insights into the entities driving this substantial Ethereum unstaking activity. It‚Äôs not just a collection of small individual stakers; some very large players are making moves. Over the past week, on-chain analysis has specifically identified significant withdrawals from wallets linked to prominent entities: HTX (formerly Huobi): Two wallets associated with the crypto exchange HTX have reportedly unstaked a combined total of 110,000 ETH . At current market valuations, this amount translates to approximately $400 million . Such a large withdrawal from an exchange often indicates a rebalancing of their reserves, a response to customer demand for withdrawals, or a strategic shift in their asset management. Abraxas Capital Management: This entity has also been noted for withdrawing more than 10,000 ETH . While smaller than HTX‚Äôs move, it still represents a significant amount, suggesting similar motivations related to profit-taking or portfolio re-optimization. Other Large Entities: Beyond these identified players, the cumulative figure of 620,000 ETH suggests that various other large stakers, including whales, institutional funds, and perhaps even other exchanges, are also contributing to the growing Ethereum unstaking queue . The decentralized nature of blockchain allows for this level of transparency, giving the community valuable insights into the flow of capital. These large-scale withdrawals highlight the dynamic nature of institutional and large-holder behavior within the crypto market. Their movements can often signal broader trends or shifts in sentiment. Understanding the Impact: What Does 620K ETH Mean for the Market? The presence of nearly 620,000 ETH in the Ethereum unstaking queue raises important questions about its potential impact on the market. While the exact effects are complex and depend on various other market factors, here are some key considerations: Increased Selling Pressure: The most immediate concern is that a significant portion of the unstaked ETH could be sold on the open market. This influx of supply, especially if it occurs rapidly, could exert downward pressure on the price of ETH. However, it‚Äôs crucial to remember that unstaking does not automatically equate to selling. Holders might move ETH to cold storage, re-stake it elsewhere, or use it in DeFi protocols. Market Liquidity: Unstaking increases the liquid supply of ETH available in the market. While a sudden surge could create volatility, increased liquidity can also be beneficial for market depth and trading efficiency in the long run. Staking Yields: If a substantial amount of ETH remains unstaked and is not immediately re-staked, the overall percentage of staked ETH on the network might decrease. This could potentially lead to an increase in staking yields for those who remain staked, as rewards are distributed among a smaller pool of stakers. Investor Confidence: Large unstaking events can sometimes be perceived negatively, suggesting a lack of confidence. However, they can also be viewed as a sign of a maturing market where participants have the flexibility to manage their assets actively. The key is to differentiate between speculative profit-taking and a fundamental loss of faith in the asset. The market‚Äôs ability to absorb this unstaked ETH will be a critical test of its resilience and the underlying demand for Ethereum. Challenges and Opportunities in the Current Staking Landscape The growing Ethereum unstaking queue presents both challenges and opportunities for the network and its participants. From a challenge perspective, the primary concern is potential downward price pressure if a significant portion of the unstaked ETH is sold. This could lead to increased volatility and a test of market stability. Furthermore, if the trend of large-scale unstaking continues without sufficient new ETH entering the staking pool, it could, in theory, impact the network‚Äôs decentralization and security, though this is a long-term and less immediate concern given Ethereum‚Äôs robust staking base. However, there are also significant opportunities: Enhanced Flexibility: The ability to unstake provides stakers with greater control over their assets, reducing the illiquidity risk previously associated with Ethereum staking. This flexibility can attract a broader range of participants, including institutional investors who require more agile asset management. Market Efficiency: Increased liquidity from unstaked ETH can lead to a more efficient market for ETH, with tighter spreads and better price discovery. Innovation in Staking Solutions: The dynamics of unstaking might spur further innovation in liquid staking derivatives (LSDs) and other staking protocols, offering new ways for users to participate in staking while maintaining liquidity. These solutions aim to mitigate the lock-up period and provide users with tradable tokens representing their staked ETH. Health Check: Large unstaking events can serve as a ‚Äústress test‚Äù for the network and its market, demonstrating its ability to handle significant capital movements. A resilient response can strengthen long-term confidence. The overall health of the Ethereum network is not solely dependent on the staking ratio but also on its utility, adoption, and ongoing development. Navigating the Ethereum Staking Environment: Actionable Insights For investors and participants in the Ethereum unstaking and staking ecosystem, understanding these dynamics is crucial. Here are some actionable insights to consider: Monitor On-Chain Data: Keep an eye on the Ethereum unstaking queue and withdrawal trends using reputable on-chain analytics platforms. This provides real-time insights into market movements. Diversify Staking Strategies: If you are a staker, consider diversifying your staking approach. This might include using liquid staking derivatives (LSDs) to maintain liquidity, exploring different staking providers, or even evaluating staking on other proof-of-stake networks. Assess Risk Tolerance: Understand that large unstaking events can introduce volatility. Ensure your portfolio allocation aligns with your personal risk tolerance. Do not invest more than you can afford to lose. Focus on Long-Term Fundamentals: While short-term price movements can be influenced by unstaking, the long-term value of Ethereum is driven by its technological advancements, ecosystem growth, and adoption. Focus on these fundamentals rather than getting swayed by temporary market fluctuations. Stay Informed: Follow reputable crypto news sources, analysts, and official Ethereum updates to stay abreast of developments that could impact staking and market sentiment. In a rapidly evolving market, informed decision-making is your most valuable asset. Conclusion: The Evolving Narrative of Ethereum Staking The rise of nearly 620,000 ETH in the Ethereum unstaking queue is a notable development, reflecting a combination of profit-taking, yield optimization, and strategic rebalancing by large holders like HTX and Abraxas Capital Management. While it introduces potential short-term market dynamics, including increased supply and possible selling pressure, it also underscores the growing maturity and flexibility of the Ethereum staking ecosystem post-Shapella. The ability for participants to freely enter and exit staking positions is a fundamental feature of a healthy, decentralized network. This event serves as a powerful reminder that the crypto market is constantly in motion. Rather than viewing large unstaking events as solely negative, it‚Äôs more productive to see them as a natural part of a dynamic market where capital flows respond to changing conditions and opportunities. As Ethereum continues its journey, the transparency provided by on-chain data allows us to observe these shifts firsthand, offering valuable lessons for investors and enthusiasts alike. The future of Ethereum unstaking and staking will continue to be a fascinating narrative to watch. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the Ethereum unstaking queue? A1: The Ethereum unstaking queue is a waiting list for stakers who wish to withdraw their locked-up ETH from the network. Due to network design and to manage withdrawals smoothly, there‚Äôs a limit to how much ETH can be unstaked at any given time, creating a queue during periods of high demand. Q2: Why are people unstaking large amounts of ETH? A2: Reasons vary but commonly include profit-taking after price appreciation, seeking higher yields elsewhere, rebalancing portfolios, or adjusting to changing market conditions and regulatory environments. Large entities like exchanges might also be responding to client withdrawal requests. Q3: How does 620,000 ETH in the unstaking queue impact the price of ETH? A3: A large amount of ETH in the unstaking queue can create potential selling pressure if holders decide to sell their unstaked ETH on the open market. This could lead to increased supply and potentially downward pressure on the ETH price. However, not all unstaked ETH is sold; some might be re-staked, used in DeFi, or held. Q4: Is it still profitable to stake Ethereum? A4: Yes, Ethereum staking can still be profitable. The annual percentage yield (APY) for staking fluctuates based on the total amount of ETH staked on the network. While large unstaking events might temporarily increase yields for remaining stakers, it‚Äôs essential to consider your individual financial goals and risk tolerance. Q5: What is the significance of HTX and Abraxas Capital Management unstaking ETH? A5: When large entities like HTX (a major exchange) and Abraxas Capital Management unstake significant amounts of ETH, it indicates substantial capital movement. These actions can reflect their strategic decisions, client demands, or a response to broader market trends, often signaling shifts in institutional sentiment or liquidity management. Q6: Where can I monitor the Ethereum unstaking queue? A6: You can monitor the Ethereum unstaking queue and other on-chain data using various blockchain analytics platforms such as Nansen, Dune Analytics, or beaconcha.in. These platforms provide real-time data on staking and withdrawal trends. Share Your Insights! Did you find this deep dive into the Ethereum unstaking phenomenon insightful? Share this article with your friends, fellow crypto enthusiasts, and on your social media channels to spark a conversation about the future of Ethereum and its evolving market dynamics. Your support helps us bring more valuable content to the crypto community! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action . This post Unstoppable Ethereum Unstaking Surge: What 620K ETH Means for the Market first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Whales continued buying ETH through OTC and open market deals.
body: Notable whale wallets are loading up on ETH again, as the token consolidated above $3,700. Some of the deals were made on the open market, showing real demand for available tokens. The buying in the last 24 hours came from anonymous whales setting up new wallets. Trump‚Äôs World Liberty Fi also added to the buying, achieving net gains despite buying at a higher average price. The additional buying resumed as ETH was trading at $3,711.34, with 11.2% market dominance. ETH remains closely watched as the potential driver of a larger altcoin rally. ETH flows to accumulation wallets are still vertical Over 22M ETH has been accumulated in dedicated wallets, in addition to the staking and other locking mechanisms. While the ETH supply is still large, the token may be going through a short-term supply crunch, as whales scramble to secure more tokens ahead of corporations and ETF. ETH accumulation entered the hockey stick zone since May, as more whales scrambled to secure ETH for staking, DeFi and long-term reserves. | Source: Cryptiquant Since May, over 7M ETH were added to accumulation addresses, which hold a balance and do not move it. The last two months led to accelerated accumulation , after years of seeing ETH as expendable. As of July, ETH activity increased, with close to 600K daily active unique addresses . ETH has been included in fully regulated products and markets, but holding the actual tokens opens multiple tools for decentralized activities. ETH has turned into a network for whales, with sufficient liquidity in lending and expanding stablecoin supply. Two new whales accumulate through OTC and exchanges Two new whale wallets were created in the past week, accumulating a total of over $240M in ETH. The first whale struck an OTC deal for 32,640 ETH, resorting to the reserves of Galaxy Digital. Newly created wallet 0x3dF3 just bought another 32,640 $ETH ($122.18M) through OTC, for a total of 43,787 $ETH ($163M) in the past 4 days. https://t.co/rZZdoV7NJi pic.twitter.com/M8GrYeNiSm ‚Äî Lookonchain (@lookonchain) July 23, 2025 Galaxy Digital itself expanded its ETH reserves to 71M in the past days, though whales immediately bought up 10M. The other whale wallet used FalconX to store 105,977 ETH, achieving the accumulation within four days. The whale buying continued even after Wintermute announced its OTC desk was virtually depleted. Currently, the market maker expanded its reserves slightly, still holding only 12.71K ETH, insufficient for even one whale purchase. The fund is buying ETH through a new address , flagged by Arkham as most probably belonging to World Liberty Fi. Trump‚Äôs fund is using its ETH actively, recently sending 1,000 tokens to Aave V3. The recent purchase follows the vote to make the WLFI token transferable and tradable. World Liberty Fi announced it will work on partnerships and infrastructure, to secure liquidity and trading pairs for the token. Owning ETH may boost the potential of World Liberty Fi to build its own Aave lending vault. KEY Difference Wire : the secret tool crypto projects use to get guaranteed media coverage

title: Fact Check: Is SWIFT Teaming Up with Ripple for XRP Payments?
body: The post Fact Check: Is SWIFT Teaming Up with Ripple for XRP Payments? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News A viral headline is making waves across crypto communities, claiming SWIFT has officially approved Ripple and XRP for all cross-border payments, touting a staggering $650 trillion to flow through the XRP Ledger (XRPL) and a massive token burn in the next 72 hours. These explosive claims are spreading fast across social media and crypto forums. But how much of it is true? In this fact-check, Coinpedia investigates the origin of the rumor, verifies the official statements from SWIFT and Ripple, and separates hype from reality. Where Did This Claim Start? The main claim appeared in a CryptoGeek headline stating : ‚ÄúSWIFT AGREEMENT WITH RIPPLE TO USE XRP FOR CROSS BORDER PAYMENTS HAS BEEN APPROVED!!‚Äù Even a Binance user posted the same, stating that billions of XRP will be blocked in escrow to boost global liquidity. Other posts go further, saying the XRPL is about to see $650 trillion added, and that a major XRP token burn will happen within three days to drive up the price even more. Fact Check: What‚Äôs Happening? There is no official confirmation from the SWIFT or Ripple team that an agreement has been finalized or ‚Äúapproved‚Äù for SWIFT to use XRP in all its cross-border payments. Meanwhile, official SWIFT communications and current crypto news show that they are exploring possible ways to integrate Ripple‚Äôs technology and XRP as a liquidity bridge, but nothing has been formally launched or approved yet. In 2025, Ripple‚Äôs CEO, Brad Garlinghouse, predicted that XRP could handle up to 14% of SWIFT‚Äôs transaction volume within five years, based on growing interest from banks. SWIFT continues to focus on updating its systems ( such as with ISO 20022 ) and has not made any announcement about switching all payment rails to XRP. Is $650 Trillion About to Be Injected into XRP? This number is way too high. SWIFT moves a huge amount of money every year, but there‚Äôs no proof that all of it will suddenly use XRP or the XRP Ledger. Some banks and payment companies do use XRP, mainly for sending money abroad in developing countries, but not on the big scale people are claiming. Is a Major XRP Token Burn Coming? There is no official or reliable information about a massive XRP token burn scheduled in the next 72 hours. XRP‚Äôs token supply and burns are strictly controlled by its creators and have not seen such announcements. Key Evidence Table: Coinpedia‚Äôs Fact Check Claim Coinpedia‚Äôs Evidence SWIFT has approved using XRP for all payments No official agreement; only talks and exploration Will $650 trillion to be injected into XRPL soon Highly exaggerated, not supported by SWIFT or Ripple Major XRP burn in next 72 hours No official announcement or evidence Conclusion Claim SWIFT has approved an agreement to use XRP for all cross-border payments. Verdict False Fact-Check by Coinpedia There is no official deal or approval for SWIFT to use XRP for global payments. Current developments show both sides are exploring possible integration, but nothing is finalized As always, trust only official news and be skeptical of viral posts promising too-good-to-be-true profits.

title: XRP's 630% Price Catalyst Returns as Whale Longs Top $1M
body: Will XRP‚Äôs Price See a 630% Increase This Time Round? Martinez recently highlighted that the Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) ratio for XRP flashed a golden cross, a technical signal that often precedes major price rallies. The last time this exact pattern appeared, XRP went into an overdrive mood, soaring by 630% in what can be marked as one of its most explosive bullish runs. An MVRV golden cross signals growing investor confidence as short-term and long-term holder metrics align often depicting a shift from undervaluation to accumulation and hinting at a strong upward price move. With the same golden cross reemerging and whales aggressively opening long positions, XRP may be on the verge of another major price surge. As a result, Martinez suggests this could be the early spark of another breakout similar to the last rally that saw XRP soar 630%, potentially propelling it from the present $3.48 to the $21.90 zone. This prediction aligns with the fact that XRP‚Äôs road to $23 recently came to light, thanks to the Valhalla Gate catalyst. Martinez also noted that XRP could be on track to hit the key $15 level after breaking out of a bullish flag, reinforcing its strong upward momentum as the third-largest crypto by market cap. Whales Open Massive XRP Longs As XRP trades at $3.48, whale wallets are quietly but decisively placing huge long bets one worth $1.02 million, the other $1.31 million‚Äîsignaling growing institutional conviction. These massive positions are no coincidence and align with several converging bullish factors: 1. Whale Accumulation on Overdrive According to WhaleTrace, more than 2.2‚ÄØbillion XRP has been moved into large wallets over the past two weeks, pushing futures open interest to a staggering $9.98 billion. On‚Äëchain records from XRPScan show skyrocketing network activity with XRP whale transfers exceeding $1 billion. Both metrics not only reflect sheer volume, but also indicate deep-pocketed whales actively positioning ahead of potential supply squeezes. 2. Institutional Tailwinds Weekly Fund inflows into XRP‚Äëlinked vehicles hit $36.1 million last week, according to CoinShares data. Derivatives metrics echo this trend since perpetual futures open interest reached a new high of $10.98‚ÄØbillion, illustrating institutional positioning. 3. Anticipating the Next Big Move Whales seems to be setting the stage for the next XRP leg because the $1.02M and $1.31M longs were opened near the $3.44 price level. Interestingly, this happened just after the surge in network volume and ahead of anticipated technical breakout zones. With strong on‚Äëchain momentum, technical signals pointing higher, and macro catalysts lining up, these whales may well be positioning for a major rally toward the $4‚Äì6 range before the close of the year. Conclusion Whales placing massive XRP longs is by design because the more than $1 million bets reflect data-driven conviction, such as surging network activity, robust derivatives positioning, technical breakout setups, and renewed institutional legibility. With the tide turning in Ripple‚Äôs favor, these long positions may well be the bellwether for the next XRP mega‚Äëmove with a 630% jump in the picture.

title: Pudgy Penguins (PENGU) extended its rally to $0.044, with expectations for additional growth.
body: Pudgy Penguins (PENGU) reached a new all-time high on the fourth anniversary of the Pudgy Penguins collection. The token also regained the top spot among Solana meme tokens. Pudgy Penguins (PENGU) is once again the top Solana meme token, after flipping BONK. The asset, linked to one of the leading NFT collections, has reclaimed its position after reshuffling among memes. PENGU also claimed a new all-time high at $0.044, above its previous high in January at $0.042. PENGU added 21.4% to its price in the last day alone, after remaining a trending token for days. PENGU rallied on a mix of meme hype, South Korean trading, and new attention for the Pudgy Penguins NFT collection and upcoming gaming products. | Source: Coingecko PENGU is also moving beyond the market hype, announcing the launch of a new battle royale game. The launch may add to the project‚Äôs exposure, combining hype with a real product, and a return of NFT activity. Pudgy Penguins new party game goes live very soon We're going for #1 on the app store on launch day, help us share the love by pre-registering today (literally click a few buttons below) üêß https://t.co/E7RMRt8FqN ‚Äî Andy (@ayyyeandy) July 23, 2025 The Pudgy Penguins NFT collection also saw its floor price rise from around 9 ETH to 16.20 ETH, close to the higher range for the past three months. PENGU becomes proxy for meme trading PENGU is rising on a mix of Solana hype, in addition to NFT reawakening on all chains. Happy Anniversary @pudgypenguins ! üíô https://t.co/mqSZ5FN9Kt pic.twitter.com/P2Fv3yfRwW ‚Äî OpenSea (@opensea) July 22, 2025 PENGU rallied after taking the spotlight over the weak performance of PUMP following the Pump.fun ICO . The token was taken up by influencers and rallied mostly on its dominant mindshare. While initially PENGU was seen as failing due to post-airdrop selling, currently the asset is viewed as undervalued based on its exposure and mentions. PENGU may also become a proxy for the meme market, due to its peak liquidity and availability on exchanges. The rally continues to be supported by trading against the Korean won. Over 38% of the PENGU trades are in Korean won pairs, up from 32% earlier this month. South Korean traders are also boosting the brand exposure, causing the breakaway rally. Pudgy Penguin creators are selling some PENGU During the latest stage of the PENGU rally, the collection‚Äôs creators sold some of their holdings. The recent sales are relatively small compared to February‚Äôs placement of 12B PENGU. In the past couple of weeks, around 1B PENGU left the collection team‚Äôs wallet . On-chain investigators noted PENGU was sold through Bybit, following the recent rapid growth from the year‚Äôs lows. The selling coincides with a period of price strength, though the team has also sold at $0.009. For now, the selling remains relatively small, but it may break the narrative of an even higher price range for PENGU. In the short term, the token is expected to rise above $0.05. PENGU open interest is also at an all-time high of over $435M. The long-short ratio remains balanced, with no shift to short-selling yet, due to the market‚Äôs potential for surprising rallies. title: Why We Started with Web3: InfoFI as Our Data Growth Strategy
body: The post Why We Started with Web3: InfoFI as Our Data Growth Strategy appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The Question Everyone‚Äôs Asking When we announced InfoFI, the question came immediately: ‚ÄúWhy Web3? Why now?‚Äù As a profitable Web2 data company serving 450+ Fortune 500 clients, we didn‚Äôt need to change. Our traditional model was working perfectly. But we saw something bigger. The Big Data Growth Challenge Traditional Data Collection Limits For years, we‚Äôve faced the same constraints every data company encounters: User fatigue : People increasingly resist surveys and data collection Privacy regulations : GDPR, CCPA limiting data access Quality decline : Paid respondents often provide low-quality data Scale bottlenecks : Growing panels is expensive and slow The InfoFI Solution Web3 technology, specifically InfoFI, solves these fundamental problems: Organic Growth : Users willingly participate because they‚Äôre rewarded Higher Quality : Financial incentives drive genuine engagement Transparent Value : Blockchain shows exactly how data creates value Network Effects : Referral systems create exponential growth Why InfoFI is the Best Way to Grow Big Data 1. Sustainable Data Quality Traditional panels burn out. InfoFI users stay engaged because they see direct financial benefits from their participation. Traditional Model : Pay $50 for a survey ‚Üí User grudgingly completes ‚Üí Poor data quality InfoFI Model : Share revenue continuously ‚Üí User actively engages ‚Üí Rich, ongoing data 2. Exponential Network Growth The referral mechanism creates viral growth impossible with traditional methods. Math : Each satisfied user refers 3 friends ‚Üí Those refer 3 more ‚Üí 1 becomes 100 in just 4 cycles Quality : Referred users are pre-qualified by existing users Cost : Organic acquisition vs. expensive paid acquisition 3. title: Institutional Demand Shifts to Ethereum! U.S. President Donald Trump-Linked Enterprise Purchases Large Ethereum! Details Here
body: World Liberty Financial (WLFI), the crypto project known for its links to US President Donald Trump, has purchased 3,473 ETH worth more than $13 million amid rising institutional interest in Ethereum. Trump-Backed World Liberty Financial Buys $13 Million in Ethereum According to data from onchain analytics platform Arkham Intelligence, purchases were made through various wallets throughout Tuesday evening. The received ETH was then staked on the decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol Aave. According to data shared by Lookonchain, World Liberty Financial's total Ethereum holdings currently stand at approximately 73,616 ETH, equivalent to approximately $275.9 million at current market prices. Institutional Demand Shifts to Ethereum World Liberty's acquisition comes amid growing interest in Ethereum from institutional investors. Spot Ethereum ETFs saw net inflows of $533.9 million on Tuesday alone, while spot Bitcoin ETFs saw outflows of $67.9 million. This suggests investors are increasingly focused on ETH in the short term. Although Ethereum's price remained stable over the past 24 hours, it has gained 20% on a weekly basis and 67.1% over the past 30 days. World Liberty has also begun the countdown to the unlock and exchange listing of its WLFI token. The project team announced last week that the token could officially begin trading within the next 6 to 8 weeks. ‚ÄúOur target for full awakening is 6 to 8 weeks. Strategic alignments (alliances, big stages, smart unlocks) take time, but the potential is great,‚Äù the project's expectations were shared. *This is not investment advice. title: MiCA License: CoinShares Secures Groundbreaking Approval for EU Crypto Investments
body: BitcoinWorld MiCA License: CoinShares Secures Groundbreaking Approval for EU Crypto Investments The world of digital assets is constantly evolving, and with that evolution comes the increasing demand for robust regulation and investor protection. In a landmark development set to reshape the European crypto landscape, CoinShares , a leading digital asset investment firm, has achieved a significant milestone. They have successfully secured a Markets in Crypto Assets (MiCA) license from France‚Äôs Autorit√© des march√©s financiers (AMF). This marks a pivotal moment, positioning CoinShares as the first crypto asset manager based in continental Europe to qualify under this comprehensive new framework, signaling a new era of regulated crypto services. What is the MiCA License and Why is it a Game-Changer for Crypto? The Markets in Crypto Assets (MiCA) regulation is a pioneering legislative framework by the European Union. Its primary goal is to provide a unified, comprehensive regulatory regime for crypto-assets across all 27 EU member states. Before MiCA, European crypto regulation was fragmented, creating uncertainty for businesses and investors. With CoinShares now holding a MiCA license , the implications are profound. Here‚Äôs why MiCA is a true game-changer: Harmonized Regulation: MiCA establishes consistent rules for crypto-asset issuers and service providers, bringing clarity and legal certainty. Enhanced Investor Protection: It introduces stringent requirements for transparency, disclosure, and operational resilience, significantly boosting investor safeguards and trust. Market Integrity: MiCA aims to prevent market manipulation and financial crime through strict anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorist financing (CTF) measures. Cross-Border Operations (Passporting): A key benefit is the ‚Äúpassporting‚Äù right. Authorization in one EU member state under MiCA allows firms to offer services across the entire European Economic Area (EEA) without needing separate national licenses, reducing hurdles and costs. This comprehensive framework fosters innovation while mitigating risks, creating a more secure environment for digital asset activities within the EU. CoinShares‚Äô Pioneering Journey: How Did They Achieve This Landmark MiCA License? CoinShares is not new to regulated finance. The firm has a strong reputation as a digital asset investment powerhouse, already holding significant credentials under existing European financial regulations. Their journey to securing the MiCA license highlights their commitment to regulatory compliance and their strategic vision. CoinShares already operates under: MiFID (Markets in Financial Instruments Directive): Governs investment services and activities across the European Economic Area, ensuring transparency and investor protection in traditional financial markets. AIFM (Alternative Investment Fund Managers Directive): Regulates managers of alternative investment funds. The MiCA license acquisition from the AMF in France demonstrates CoinShares‚Äô proactive approach. It involved rigorous scrutiny of their operational procedures, compliance frameworks, and investor protection measures. By navigating this complex process, CoinShares validated its robust infrastructure and set a precedent for other firms. This strategic move allows them to expand their regulated crypto portfolio services, solidifying their position as a trusted leader in the digital asset sector. Navigating the Regulatory Landscape: What Challenges and Opportunities Does MiCA Present? While MiCA brings immense clarity and opportunity, new comprehensive regulatory frameworks also present challenges. Adapting to MiCA requires significant investment in compliance infrastructure, legal expertise, and operational adjustments. Challenges: Compliance Complexity: MiCA is extensive. Understanding and implementing its requirements, from disclosure to operational resilience, is resource-intensive. Technological Adaptation: Ensuring systems comply with MiCA‚Äôs requirements for data reporting, security, and transaction monitoring is a hurdle. Talent Acquisition: Demand for professionals with crypto and regulatory compliance expertise is high, making talent acquisition challenging. Opportunities: Increased Market Access: Passporting allows firms to scale operations across the entire EU with a single license, unlocking a massive market. Enhanced Credibility: Operating under a MiCA license significantly boosts a firm‚Äôs credibility, attracting institutional investors and traditional financial players. Level Playing Field: MiCA creates a more level playing field, ensuring all participants adhere to similar standards, fostering healthier competition and reducing illicit activities. Innovation within a Framework: MiCA is technology-neutral, allowing continued innovation within legal boundaries, encouraging responsible development of new crypto products. CoinShares‚Äô success in obtaining the MiCA license shows these challenges are surmountable for prepared firms, paving the way for a more mature European crypto market. Impact on the European Crypto Market: What‚Äôs Next After CoinShares‚Äô MiCA Milestone? The ripple effects of CoinShares securing the first continental European MiCA license are expected to be far-reaching, fundamentally altering the trajectory of the European crypto market. This milestone will likely trigger a domino effect, encouraging more institutional participation and fostering greater investor confidence. Here‚Äôs what we can anticipate: Area of Impact Description Institutional Adoption MiCA‚Äôs clarity, exemplified by CoinShares, makes it easier for traditional financial institutions to enter crypto. They now have a clear regulatory pathway, reducing perceived risks. Investor Confidence Retail and institutional investors benefit from enhanced protections. Knowing providers operate under a unified framework builds trust in digital assets as a legitimate class. Innovation and Growth MiCA creates a secure environment for innovation. Firms can develop new crypto products with greater legal certainty, potentially boosting regulated decentralized finance (DeFi) in the EU. Regulatory Precedent CoinShares‚Äô success sets a powerful precedent, showing other EU member states that MiCA implementation is achievable and beneficial, potentially accelerating its adoption across the bloc. Global Influence The EU‚Äôs MiCA framework is being watched globally. Its successful implementation and emergence of regulated entities like CoinShares could influence how other jurisdictions approach crypto regulation, leading to more global harmonization. This groundbreaking step by CoinShares, leveraging their new MiCA license , validates the concept of regulated digital asset management and sets a high bar for future market participants in Europe. Actionable Insights: What Does CoinShares‚Äô MiCA License Mean for You? Whether you‚Äôre an individual investor, a financial advisor, or a firm in the digital asset space, CoinShares‚Äô achievement carries important implications. Understanding these insights helps navigate the evolving crypto landscape. For Investors: Seek Regulated Entities: Prioritize service providers operating under robust regulatory frameworks like MiCA. This offers added security and consumer protection. Understand Offerings: As regulated products emerge, understand what a MiCA license means for specific crypto portfolio services. Look for transparency. Enhanced Trust: A MiCA license provides greater peace of mind, knowing the firm adheres to high compliance and operational integrity standards. For Financial Advisors and Institutions: Explore Partnership Opportunities: MiCA-licensed firms like CoinShares are well-positioned to partner with traditional financial institutions seeking compliant crypto exposure. Stay Informed on Regulation: Keep abreast of MiCA‚Äôs implementation and its implications for crypto assets. This knowledge is crucial for advising clients and strategic decisions. Leverage Compliance as a Competitive Edge: For institutions entering crypto, prioritizing MiCA compliance can be a significant advantage, attracting discerning clients and partners. This landmark achievement by CoinShares underscores a clear trend: the future of significant crypto investment in Europe is firmly rooted in regulation and compliance. It‚Äôs a call to action for all market participants to adapt and embrace this new, more mature phase of the digital asset economy. Conclusion: A Groundbreaking Step Towards a Regulated Crypto Future CoinShares‚Äô successful acquisition of the MiCA license from France‚Äôs AMF is more than just a corporate achievement; it‚Äôs a pivotal moment for the entire European digital asset industry. By becoming the first crypto asset manager in continental Europe to qualify, CoinShares has solidified its leadership and illuminated the path forward for the broader market. This groundbreaking development signifies a crucial shift towards a more mature, regulated, and secure environment for crypto investments. It enhances investor protection, fosters market integrity, and paves the way for increased institutional participation across the EU. As the digital asset landscape evolves, CoinShares stands at the forefront, demonstrating that innovation and compliance can go hand-in-hand. This is a powerful testament to the future of regulated finance, where digital assets are integrated safely and confidently into the global financial ecosystem. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the MiCA license? A1: The Markets in Crypto Assets (MiCA) license is a regulatory authorization under the European Union‚Äôs comprehensive MiCA framework. It provides unified rules for crypto-asset issuers and service providers across all 27 EU member states, ensuring legal clarity, investor protection, and market integrity. Q2: Why is CoinShares obtaining the MiCA license significant? A2: CoinShares is the first crypto asset manager in continental Europe to obtain this license. This allows them to offer regulated crypto portfolio services across the entire EU via ‚Äúpassporting‚Äù rights, setting a precedent for compliant operations in the region. Q3: How does the MiCA license benefit investors? A3: For investors, the MiCA license brings enhanced protection through stricter transparency, disclosure, and operational resilience requirements. It builds greater trust and confidence in regulated digital asset investments, reducing risks associated with unregulated markets. Q4: Will other crypto firms also seek MiCA licenses? A4: Yes, it‚Äôs highly anticipated that many other crypto firms in the EU will seek MiCA licenses. CoinShares‚Äô success demonstrates the viability and strategic advantage of obtaining this authorization, especially given the cross-border benefits. Q5: How does MiCA compare to existing financial regulations like MiFID or AIFM? A5: MiCA is tailored for crypto assets, while MiFID and AIFM regulate traditional financial instruments and alternative investment funds. MiCA aims to bring crypto assets into a similar regulatory fold, complementing existing credentials like CoinShares‚Äô MiFID and AIFM licenses. Q6: What are the long-term implications of MiCA for the EU crypto market? A6: Long-term implications include increased institutional crypto adoption, greater investor confidence, fostering innovation within regulation, and potentially influencing global crypto standards. It aims to mature the EU crypto market, integrating it with traditional finance. If you found this article insightful and believe in the importance of regulated growth in the crypto space, please consider sharing it with your network! Your support helps us spread awareness about crucial developments shaping the future of digital assets. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital asset institutional adoption. This post MiCA License: CoinShares Secures Groundbreaking Approval for EU Crypto Investments first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Here‚Äôs how much Bitcoin Peter Schiff actually owns
body: Outspoken Bitcoin ( BTC ) critic and gold advocate Peter Schiff has acknowledged holding a small amount of Bitcoin, despite his long-standing skepticism toward the cryptocurrency . In a post on X (formerly Twitter) on July 22, Schiff wrote: ‚ÄúSomeone pointed out that I do own Bitcoin. I have some in my Strategic Bitcoin Reserve. But I promised donors that I‚Äôd never sell, so it‚Äôs like I don‚Äôt really own it. The market value is over $6,500. Feel free to contribute to the cause. Bc1q0vxwxsmkjy5t95qpc0mfznl59928grsr4wfa97.‚Äù Someone pointed out that I do own Bitcoin. I have some in my Strategic Bitcoin Reserve. But I promised donors that I'd never sell, so it's like I don't really own it. The market value is over $6,500. Feel free to contribute to the cause. bc1q0vxwxsmkjy5t95qpc0mfznl59928grsr4wfa97 ‚Äî Peter Schiff (@PeterSchiff) July 22, 2025 According to data retrieved by Finbold from Arkham Intel, as of July 23, 2025, Schiff holds 0.0564 BTC, worth approximately $6,670 at Bitcoin‚Äôs current price of $118,373. Peter Schiff‚Äôs Bitcoin portfolio. Source: Arkham In addition to Bitcoin, Schiff‚Äôs publicly identifiable crypto wallet contains roughly $11,985 worth of digital assets. This includes 29.75 million Physical Gold (GOLD) tokens (valued at around $3,240), alongside smaller allocations in tokens such as Sloth, Buttcoin, Imagen (IMG), SPX, Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC), and others. While Schiff maintains his stance as a staunch Bitcoin skeptic, the presence of BTC and other digital assets in his portfolio reflects the irony of his public persona, and perhaps the ongoing evolution of the crypto conversation, even among its most vocal critics. The post Here‚Äôs how much Bitcoin Peter Schiff actually owns appeared first on Finbold .

title: SEC May Soon Grant Highly-Awaited Approval for Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs! "Positive Developments!" Bloomberg Analyst Explains
body: While positive decisions regarding the cryptocurrency industry continue to come from the SEC, the latest news came for Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH). Accordingly, Bloomberg analyst James Seyffart said that the SEC is increasingly likely to approve in-kind refunds for Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. Seyffart cited numerous filings filed with the SEC yesterday, stating that progress has been made with the SEC following recent filings by issuers to add in-kind payments to Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. At this point, Seyffart noted that five issuers with Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs on the CBOE have amended their prospectuses, citing ‚Äúpositive action‚Äù from the SEC regarding approval of in-kind redemptions for their funds. These include Invesco Galaxy, Ark 21Shares, VanEck, WisdomTree, and Fidelity. The analyst noted that these changes could be a sign that issuers have reached an agreement with federal regulators regarding their demands to add in-kind reimbursements to BTC and ETH ETF funds. ‚ÄúMore positive signs regarding Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs becoming available for in-kind creation and redemption Five different funds on the CBOE have filed amendments with the SEC. This to me indicates positive movement and likely fine-tuning at the SEC.‚Äù Spot redemption is a method where ETF investors are repaid with actual virtual assets (cryptocurrencies) rather than cash, and is considered advantageous in terms of market efficiency and taxation. *This is not investment advice. title: Grayscale ETF Head David LaValle to Exit as Firm Eyes IPO: Report
body: David LaValle, the global head of ETFs at Grayscale Investments, is set to leave the crypto asset manager at the end of July, Unchained reported , citing people familiar with the matter. LaValle joined Grayscale in July 2021 as the firm was grappling with investor dissatisfaction over the widening discount of its flagship Bitcoin Trust (GBTC). At the time, the trust held around $25 billion, making company the largest crypto asset manager. Its price lagged far behind the value of the bitcoin it held, frustrating shareholders. While much of the attention around GBTC‚Äôs eventual conversion to a spot bitcoin ETF focused on Grayscale‚Äôs court battle with the SEC , LaValle was instrumental behind the scenes. He worked to secure launch partners and authorized participants, Unchained reports. Still, the conversion hasn‚Äôt been the growth engine Grayscale might have hoped for. In the year and a half since, BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT) has taken overtaken Grayscale's ETF with over $87.9 billion in assets. GBTC‚Äôs assets have shrunk to under $22 billion, according to SoSoValue data. LaValle‚Äôs exit follows last year‚Äôs resignation of CEO Michael Sonnenshein , who was replaced by Peter Mintzberg. The firm confidentially submitted a draft S-1 registration statement with the SEC earlier this month, indicating plans for an IPO.
