title: Strategy's 4th Preferred Stock: STRC Is Here To Attack Money Market Funds
body: Summary Strategy's capital structure is a masterclass in financial engineering, creating a Bitcoin-backed yield curve to attract diverse investor capital efficiently. The new STRC preferred stock is designed as a low-duration, high-yield instrument to directly compete with money market funds, offering superior yield and stability. STRC's price stabilization mechanisms ensure principal preservation and yield competitiveness, drawing capital away from traditional cash equivalents and fueling further Bitcoin accumulation. I remain bullish on Strategy's common and preferreds, as each issuance strengthens the capital stack, increases intrinsic value, and perpetuates the Bitcoin accumulation flywheel. If you‚Äôve been following my coverage of Strategy‚Äôs ( MSTR ) capital structure, you know I‚Äôm a firm believer in Saylor‚Äôs vision to develop Strategy into the ultimate levered Bitcoin ( BTC-USD ) investment vehicle by essentially selling superior financial securities to the market. I previously covered ( STRK ) and ( STRF ) extensively here and here , while my previous article on STRD, their third preferred stock, highlighted how Saylor‚Äôs financial engineering creates a self-reinforcing flywheel, capturing capital from diverse investor classes to fuel Bitcoin accumulation. With STRC (STRC), Strategy takes this utterly corporate finance textbook-shuttering plan to a new level, introducing a low-duration, high-yield security designed to compete directly with money market funds. So, beyond further opening up its capital stack, Strategy is set to optimize its yield curve further. In fact, as I am about to explain, Strategy is setting itself to attract capital at unprecedented efficiency through STRC by creating what you can think of as a "black hole" in the world of short-term yield parking. Building the Yield Curve We have so far witnessed how Strategy's capital structure is a carefully crafted ecosystem, with each preferred (STRK, STRF, STRD, and now STRC) serving a distinct purpose in attracting capital from different investor profiles, which, in turn, Strategy leverages by attaching an at-the-money offering program. By issuing securities with varying risk/reward characteristics, Saylor and Co. is effectively building a Bitcoin-backed yield curve, where each instrument settles a specific niche in terms of duration, yield, and seniority. This system enables Strategy to tap into a broad spectrum of capital markets, ranging from risk-tolerant equity investors ( MSTR ) to conservative fixed-income seekers ( STRF ), to those seeking a middle ground ( STRK ) or even those willing to sit at a lower seniority level for higher yield ( STRD ), while minimizing financing costs and maximizing Bitcoin accumulation. MSTR's Yield Curve (STRC IPO Presentation) In my previous article, I explained how the introduction of STRD, a high-yield, junior preferred stock with a 10% dividend, was an indirect move to elevate the creditworthiness of STRF, the senior-most preferred in the capital stack. By offering a ‚Äújunky‚Äù security with the exact same 10% yield as STRF, Strategy effectively pushed STRF‚Äôs perceived safety higher, encouraging investors to bid up its price above par, thus lowering its effective yield. This dynamic has allowed Strategy to issue STRF at a premium, raising capital at a lower cost while reinforcing the collateral base backing the entire capital structure. The result is a virtuous cycle where each new issuance strengthens the senior securities, attracts more capital, and funds further Bitcoin buys. MSTR's Preferred Stock Yields (STRC IPO Presentation) You can see in the chart above how my prediction played out quite accurately. The moment STRD entered the chat, the market has been chasing all three preferreds higher in order for each to more accurately reflect its underlying risk/reward ratio. The reality that the market is also getting increasingly educated about how these products are indeed superior to their tradfi peers (i.e., STRF is a superior credit instrument versus any other super long-term competitor, from the 30-Y US bond to Austria's 100-Y government bond ) has also contributed to this rally. It‚Äôs also clear that capital keeps flowing steadily into Strategy‚Äôs preferreds, especially when you compare them to the broader market. Just look at the underwhelming performance of the iShares Preferred and Income Securities ETF ( PFF ), which has lagged well behind. Again, this makes total sense as Strategy's preferreds are structurally superior in every shape or form, including the fact that they are overcollateralized multiple times over against Strategy's BTC holdings. MSTR's Preferreds vs. PFF (STRC IPO Presentation) STRC: The Money Market Competitor Now, here comes STRC, a perpetual preferred stock with a variable monthly dividend , initially set to deliver a high yield but (in my view) engineered to stabilize just above money market fund rates. Unlike say STRF, which competes with ultra-long-duration instruments due to its perpetual nature, STRC is engineered to be a low-duration security, offering investors near-cash-like stability with a superior yield. This positions STRC as a direct competitor to money market funds , which typically provide low yields (currently around 4-5% in a high-rate environment) but are prized for their liquidity and principal preservation. The financial engineering behind STRC is nothing short of marvelous (or crazy, depending on which camp you are sitting in). Strategy basically aims to maintain STRC‚Äôs price close to its $100 par value through a series of levers: If STRC trades at $101 or above: Strategy can (1) decrease the dividend rate, (2) issue additional STRC via secondary offerings at or below $101, or (3) call STRC at $101. If STRC trades at $99 or below: Strategy can (1) increase the dividend rate or (2) cease selling STRC in at-the-market (ATM) offerings below $99. STRC's Price Manipulation Mechanisms (STRC IPO Presentation) These mechanisms synthetically ensure that STRC remains a highly attractive, stable investment, mimicking the principal preservation of money market funds while offering a higher yield. Initially, STRC‚Äôs yield may be elevated to draw capital, potentially in the 9.5% to 10% range. However, as the security gains traction, I believe Strategy will fine-tune the dividend to hover just above money market fund rates, say, 4% to 5% in 3% to 3.5% rate environment. This strategy ensures STRC remains competitive compared to investing in a money market fund, thus gradually drawing capital away from traditional cash equivalents. It's essentially an attack on money market funds. Now here's where things get really interesting. In a scenario where the money market fund rates drop to 1-2% in a low-rate environment (as they did in the early 2020s - they, in fact, went negative in Europe ), STRC could offer a 2.5% to 3% yield, providing a premium while still being an ultra-low-cost financing tool for Strategy. This is a win-win as STRC holders enjoy a higher yield than money market funds with comparable principal stability, while Strategy secures cheap capital to acquire Bitcoin, which they project will appreciate at a CAGR of 21% over the next 21 years. The Flywheel: Why This Isn‚Äôt a Ponzi Scheme I know that many believe that Strategy‚Äôs non-stop issuance of common and preferred shares looks like a Ponzi scheme, as it relies on new capital to sustain dividends and fuel Bitcoin purchases. However, this perspective misses the mark of Strategy's engineering. As I argued in my STRD article, Strategy isn‚Äôt just issuing securities for the sake of raising capital. It is instead creating superior financial products that attract capital precisely because they offer better risk/reward profiles than competing instruments. Now, skeptics will proudly counter by arguing that this structure depends on MSTR‚Äôs common stock trading above par to fund preferred dividends, which is both very risky and dilutive. However, the accretive nature of Strategy‚Äôs preferreds supports the common stock‚Äôs premium . By issuing STRC, STRD, STRK, and STRF, Strategy raises capital at low costs, acquires more Bitcoin, and strengthens the collateral base backing the entire capital stack. This increases the intrinsic value of MSTR‚Äôs common stock, thus justifying its >1mNAV multiple. In the flywheel effect, each preferred issuance fuels Bitcoin accumulation, which boosts the value of the common per share, which in turn supports further preferred issuances. Besides, issuing common stock above NAV to pay preferred dividends is by definition accretive. If your common stock is trading at 2x NAV, you are selling $1 for $2 to pay dividends, which is something you want to do all day long. This is why, as long as, in theory, the engineering after Strategy's instruments remains legit, I remain bullish on common and its preferreds. I have also been selling OTM puts on the common as the premiums are just too juicy not to harvest them. I am looking forward to reading your thoughts on STRC. I know it's a very new instrument, and there's nothing quite like it on the market, so feel free to leave your questions, and I will try to address each one to the best of my ability.

title: Amazon has closed its Shanghai AI lab
body: Amazon has shut down its Shanghai-based artificial intelligence lab, marking the latest retreat by a major US tech company from Chinese research operations as tensions mount between Washington and Beijing over the future of advanced technologies. The closure, which affects the Amazon Web Services (AWS) research unit established in 2018, is part of a strategic pullback, with the company citing ongoing internal restructuring. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve made the difficult business decision to eliminate some roles across particular teams in AWS,‚Äù said Amazon spokesperson Brad Glasser. ‚ÄúThese decisions are necessary as we continue to invest, hire, and optimise resources.‚Äù Amazon‚Äôs six-year run ends amid strategic recalibration Wang Minjie, a senior scientist at the AWS Shanghai AI lab, confirmed the lab‚Äôs closure in a WeChat post, stating that the team was ‚Äúbeing dissolved due to strategic adjustments amid US-China tensions.‚Äù Over its six-year tenure, the lab published more than 100 academic papers and developed an open-source neural network framework for graph-based data, which Wang claimed helped generate nearly $1 billion in revenue for Amazon . The lab also contributed to AWS‚Äôs global research output, operating at the intersection of fundamental AI research and cloud infrastructure innovation. Amazon did not disclose how many employees were affected. However, sources familiar with the matter said the AWS China division once employed over 1,000 people at its peak. America is pulling out of China Amazon‚Äôs retreat is part of a growing exodus of US technology firms pulling research operations out of China. Earlier this year, Microsoft shut down its Internet of Things and AI Insider Lab in Shanghai, relocating some Chinese-based AI staff to other countries amid escalating restrictions on technology exports. In 2024, IBM laid off more than 1,000 China-based R&D staff, consolidating research functions outside the country. Also, consultancy giant McKinsey recently barred its China practice from generative AI work following heightened geopolitical scrutiny. A major reason for these moves can be attributed to the intensification of US export controls aimed at curbing China‚Äôs access to advanced semiconductors and AI development tools. New rules implemented by the Trump administration have restricted Chinese firms and institutions from purchasing cutting-edge chips and using US cloud computing services for AI training. Domestic competition is rising to fill the gap While AWS still maintains some commercial activity in China, primarily serving multinationals and local tech firms with global operations, its core research operations have been increasingly constrained. The Shanghai lab, once positioned as a center of excellence for AI and cloud research, has now become the latest casualty of the tech sector‚Äôs global realignment. Industry analysts suggest the pullbacks could create opportunities for Chinese tech giants to fill the gap. Companies like Baidu, Tencent, and Alibaba have significantly ramped up investment in domestic AI development, including the launch of large language models and dedicated chip design teams. However, the exodus of foreign labs from China also raises concerns about talent flow and the fragmentation of global tech ecosystems, among others. As national security concerns override commercial logic, the once-global AI research landscape is increasingly being divided across geopolitical lines. title: Bybit and Cactus Custody Announce Strategic Partnership with Cactus Oasis Integration
body: BitcoinWorld Bybit and Cactus Custody Announce Strategic Partnership with Cactus Oasis Integration DUBAI , UAE , July 23, 2025 /PRNewswire/ ‚Äî Bybit , the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, today announces a strategic partnership with Cactus Custody, Asia‚Äôs leading compliant and licensed digital asset custodian under¬†Matrixport Group. Together, they are launching an off-exchange settlement solution via Cactus Oasis , designed to enhance asset security, capital efficiency, and operational control for institutional clients. The integration will go live on July 28, 2025 . This partnership enables institutional and professional clients to trade directly on Bybit without pre-funding exchange accounts. Clients deposit collateral into Cactus Custody, where assets are held in fully segregated, regulated custody and transferred to Bybit only at the point of trade settlement, reducing counterparty risk while maintaining access to market liquidity. Shunyet Jan, Head of Institutional and Derivatives at Bybit , commented: ‚ÄúBybit is committed to providing institutions with a secure and efficient trading environment. The integration of Cactus Oasis gives our clients more flexibility in managing liquidity without compromising asset protection.‚Äù Enhanced Asset Security and Efficiency With Cactus Oasis, institutional clients can trade on Bybit while keeping their collateral securely held in independent custody. Assets remain protected with Cactus Custody until trade settlement, improving capital efficiency and aligning with strict internal governance requirements. Cactus Custody delivers bank-grade security through a tiered hot and cold wallet system, combining hardware security module (HSM) encryption with institutional-grade cold storage. It holds SOC 1 Type 1 and SOC 2 Type 2 certifications from Deloitte and is licensed as a Hong Kong Trust Company and Trust or Company Service Provider (TCSP) under the Hong Kong Monetary Authority, meeting the compliance standards of leading financial institutions. Cactus Oasis: Tailored for Institutional Needs Cactus Oasis offers cross-platform custody through Buffer accounts, a Cactus Oasis feature, streamlining asset management across multiple exchanges. It provides flexible risk controls, including dual- and pre-authorization modes, customizable approval and settlement workflows, and compliance with KYC, KYB, and KYT requirements. Role-based access and multi-level permissions ensure robust governance and operational efficiency. Wendy Jiang , General Manager of Cactus Custody, said: ‚ÄúThis integration with Bybit addresses institutional demands for secure custody, risk reduction, and efficient post-trade settlement. It represents a meaningful step in advancing digital asset trading infrastructure and driving institutional adoption.‚Äù Driving Institutional Adoption Globally Bybit and Cactus Custody share a joint vision of supporting institutional adoption with compliant, transparent, and scalable infrastructure. This partnership is particularly impactful for institutions in the Asia-Pacific region, where regulatory clarity, risk controls, and capital flexibility are essential to long-term engagement. #Bybit / #TheCryptoArk / #IMakeIt About Bybit Bybit is the world‚Äôs second-largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, serving a global community of over 70 million users. Founded in 2018, Bybit is redefining openness in the decentralized world by creating a simpler, open and equal ecosystem for everyone. With a strong focus on Web3, Bybit partners strategically with leading blockchain protocols to provide robust infrastructure and drive on-chain innovation. Renowned for its secure custody, diverse marketplaces, intuitive user experience, and advanced blockchain tools, Bybit bridges the gap between TradFi and DeFi, empowering builders, creators, and enthusiasts to unlock the full potential of Web3. Discover the future of decentralized finance at Bybit.com . For more details about Bybit, please visit Bybit Press For media inquiries, please contact: media@bybit.com For updates, please follow: Bybit‚Äôs Communities and Social Media Discord | Facebook | Instagram | LinkedIn | Reddit | Telegram | TikTok | X | Youtube This post Bybit and Cactus Custody Announce Strategic Partnership with Cactus Oasis Integration first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by chainwire

title: Bitcoin Exchange Binance Announces Delisting of Two Altcoin Trading Pairs Due to Low Liquidity! Here Are the Details
body: Binance, one of the world's largest cryptocurrency exchanges, announced that it will remove two spot trading pairs from its platform as a result of periodic reviews conducted to maintain market quality and protect its users. Binance Delisting Two Low Liquidity Spot Trading Pairs Binance will cease trading the following spot trading pairs on July 25, 2025, at 06:00: GPS/FDUSD HIVE/FDUSD According to the company's statement, the reasons for removing these trading pairs include factors such as low liquidity and insufficient trading volume. Binance stated that the relevant tokens have not been completely delisted and users can continue to trade GPS, HIVE, and FDUSD assets on other trading pairs on Binance. Additionally, Spot Trading Bots (automated trading bots) will also be discontinued on the same date for these two trading pairs. Users are advised to update or cancel their bots before this date to avoid potential losses. Binance emphasized that such delistings, aimed at improving market quality and keeping the user experience safe, ensure the healthy trading of pairs traded on the platform. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Bitcoin Exchange Binance Announces Delisting of Two Altcoin Trading Pairs Due to Low Liquidity! Here Are the Details

title: Bitcoin Price Alert: Decoding the Sudden Drop Below $118,000
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Price Alert: Decoding the Sudden Drop Below $118,000 The cryptocurrency world is abuzz with the latest market movement: Bitcoin, the undisputed king of digital assets, has recently experienced a significant tumble, falling below the $118,000 mark. This crucial development has sent ripples across the entire crypto ecosystem, prompting investors and enthusiasts alike to ponder the immediate implications and future trajectory of the Bitcoin price . According to real-time market monitoring by Bitcoin World, BTC was observed trading at $117,968 on the Binance USDT market. This dip, while not unprecedented in Bitcoin‚Äôs volatile history, certainly commands attention and warrants a deeper dive into its potential causes and consequences. For anyone invested in or considering entering the crypto space, understanding these market shifts is absolutely essential. What Triggered This Bitcoin Price Movement? When the Bitcoin price takes a notable dip, it‚Äôs rarely due to a single, isolated event. Instead, it‚Äôs typically a complex interplay of various factors, both internal to the crypto market and external macroeconomic forces. Understanding these triggers is key to interpreting market behavior. Macroeconomic Headwinds: The broader global economic landscape significantly influences risk-on assets like Bitcoin. Concerns over persistent inflation, aggressive interest rate hikes by central banks (such as the Federal Reserve), and geopolitical tensions can lead investors to de-risk their portfolios, pulling funds from more speculative assets. When traditional markets show signs of instability, the ripple effect often reaches the crypto market, impacting the Bitcoin price . Market Sentiment and FUD (Fear, Uncertainty, Doubt): The cryptocurrency market is highly sensitive to news and rumors. Negative regulatory news from major economies, concerns over the solvency of crypto exchanges or lending platforms, or even widespread social media speculation can quickly erode investor confidence. This FUD can trigger panic selling, creating a downward spiral for prices. Technical Analysis Breakdowns: Professional traders and algorithms often rely on technical indicators and support levels. When the Bitcoin price breaks below a significant psychological or technical support level, such as the $118,000 mark, it can trigger automatic sell orders and encourage further selling pressure as traders anticipate continued declines. Whale Activity: Large holders of Bitcoin, often referred to as ‚Äòwhales,‚Äô can exert considerable influence on the market. A significant sell-off by one or more whales can inject a large supply of Bitcoin into the market, overwhelming demand and causing a rapid decline in price. Tracking these large movements is a constant endeavor for market analysts. Liquidity Issues: While Bitcoin is highly liquid, sudden large sell orders in a specific market can temporarily overwhelm buying interest, especially if liquidity is concentrated on a few exchanges. This can lead to rapid price discovery downwards until new buyers step in. The confluence of these factors often creates a perfect storm, leading to sharp corrections in the Bitcoin price , reminding us of the inherent volatility that defines this innovative asset class. The Immediate Impact on Bitcoin Price and the Wider Market A sudden drop in Bitcoin price below a key level like $118,000 doesn‚Äôt just affect Bitcoin itself; it sends tremors throughout the entire cryptocurrency ecosystem. The immediate aftermath can be a period of heightened uncertainty and rapid re-evaluation for all market participants. Investor Reaction and Sentiment: For many investors, a sharp decline triggers a mix of fear and opportunity. Some may panic sell to cut losses, contributing to further downward pressure. Others, particularly those with a long-term conviction, may view it as a ‚Äòbuy the dip‚Äô opportunity, looking to accumulate more Bitcoin at a perceived discount. This divergence in reaction often creates choppy market conditions. Altcoin Correlation: Bitcoin is often considered the bellwether of the crypto market. When the Bitcoin price moves significantly, altcoins (alternative cryptocurrencies) tend to follow suit. A drop in BTC usually leads to a corresponding decline across most altcoins, although some may experience more severe percentage losses due to their smaller market caps and higher volatility. Projects like Ethereum, Solana, and Cardano often see their prices influenced heavily by Bitcoin‚Äôs performance. Liquidation Events: For traders using leverage, a sharp drop in price can trigger forced liquidations. When the value of their collateral falls below a certain threshold, exchanges automatically close their positions to prevent further losses, which can amplify selling pressure and accelerate the price decline in a cascading effect. This is a particularly dangerous aspect of highly leveraged trading during volatile periods. Market Narrative Shift: A significant price drop can shift the overall market narrative from bullish optimism to cautious pessimism. Media coverage might focus more on the risks and challenges of cryptocurrency investment, which can further deter new entrants and put pressure on existing holders. Potential for Rebound: While immediate impact can be negative, history shows that significant dips in Bitcoin price often precede periods of strong recovery. The question becomes whether the underlying fundamentals remain strong enough to attract new buying interest and overcome the bearish sentiment. Understanding these immediate impacts is crucial for investors to make informed decisions and manage their portfolios effectively in the face of market volatility. Navigating Volatility: Strategies for Bitcoin Price Swings The recent drop in Bitcoin price serves as a potent reminder that volatility is an inherent characteristic of the cryptocurrency market. While it can be daunting, experienced investors employ several strategies to navigate these swings and potentially turn them into opportunities. Here‚Äôs how you can approach periods of significant price movement: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Before making any investment decisions, especially during periods of market stress, thoroughly research Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamentals, its underlying technology, and its long-term potential. Rely on credible sources like Bitcoin World and avoid making decisions based solely on social media hype or fear. Understanding why the Bitcoin price is moving helps in making rational choices. Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): This strategy involves investing a fixed amount of money at regular intervals (e.g., weekly or monthly), regardless of the asset‚Äôs price. When the price is high, your fixed amount buys fewer units; when the price is low, it buys more. Over time, this averages out your purchase price and reduces the risk associated with trying to ‚Äòtime the market.‚Äô It‚Äôs an excellent approach for mitigating the impact of Bitcoin price fluctuations. Implement Robust Risk Management: Never invest more than you can afford to lose. This golden rule is paramount in volatile markets. Consider setting stop-loss orders to limit potential downside if the price continues to fall beyond a certain point. Diversifying your portfolio beyond just Bitcoin, perhaps into other asset classes or even stablecoins, can also reduce overall risk exposure. Maintain a Long-Term Vision (HODL): For those who believe in Bitcoin‚Äôs revolutionary potential and its role as a digital store of value, significant price dips can be viewed as temporary setbacks on a long-term growth trajectory. The ‚ÄòHODL‚Äô (Hold On for Dear Life) philosophy encourages investors to ride out short-term volatility based on a strong conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs future. Historically, Bitcoin has recovered from far more severe corrections. Stay Informed, Not Obsessed: While it‚Äôs important to be aware of market developments, constantly checking charts and reacting to every minor fluctuation can lead to emotional decisions. Follow reputable news outlets and analysis, but avoid getting caught up in the daily noise. Focus on the broader trends and the factors influencing the long-term Bitcoin price . By adopting these disciplined strategies, investors can approach market volatility with a clearer mind and a more resilient portfolio, rather than being swept away by fear or greed. What Does This Bitcoin Price Dip Mean for the Future? While the recent drop in Bitcoin price below $118,000 may seem concerning in the short term, it‚Äôs crucial to view such movements within the broader context of Bitcoin‚Äôs historical performance and its evolving role in the global financial landscape. Bitcoin has a proven track record of resilience, often recovering from significant corrections to reach new all-time highs. Historical Resilience: Bitcoin has endured numerous dramatic price crashes throughout its history, only to rebound stronger. Each major correction has often purged speculative excess from the market, paving the way for more sustainable growth. This inherent resilience suggests that while dips are painful, they are a normal part of its growth cycle. Maturing Market Infrastructure: The cryptocurrency market is far more mature now than it was during previous cycles. We‚Äôre seeing increased institutional adoption, clearer regulatory discussions (even if slow), and the development of more robust financial products like Bitcoin ETFs. This growing infrastructure provides a stronger foundation, potentially cushioning future drops and supporting long-term growth for the Bitcoin price . Upcoming Halving Cycles: Bitcoin‚Äôs supply is programmatically capped, and its issuance rate is cut in half approximately every four years through an event known as ‚Äòhalving.‚Äô Historically, these halving events have preceded significant bull runs due to the reduced supply of new Bitcoin entering the market. While not an immediate factor, future halvings remain a powerful long-term driver for the Bitcoin price . Global Adoption Trends: Despite short-term price volatility, the fundamental adoption of Bitcoin and blockchain technology continues to expand globally. More businesses are accepting crypto payments, more countries are exploring central bank digital currencies (CBDCs), and awareness is growing. This increasing utility and acceptance are strong long-term tailwinds. A Test of Conviction: For many, these dips are a test of conviction. They separate those looking for quick gains from those who truly believe in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value proposition as a decentralized, scarce digital asset. The current Bitcoin price action, therefore, can be seen as a necessary market correction that strengthens its foundation for future growth. In essence, while short-term fluctuations are inevitable, the long-term outlook for Bitcoin price remains tied to its fundamental strengths, increasing utility, and the relentless innovation within the broader crypto space. Informed investors understand that patience and a long-term perspective are often rewarded. Conclusion The recent fall of the Bitcoin price below $118,000, as reported by Bitcoin World and observed on Binance, underscores the dynamic and often unpredictable nature of the cryptocurrency market. This movement is a result of a complex interplay of macroeconomic pressures, market sentiment, technical indicators, and whale activity. While such dips can trigger immediate concerns, they are also a fundamental characteristic of a maturing asset class. For investors, understanding these triggers and their immediate impacts is crucial. More importantly, adopting disciplined strategies such as Dollar-Cost Averaging, robust risk management, and maintaining a long-term perspective are vital for navigating volatility. History has shown Bitcoin‚Äôs remarkable resilience, consistently recovering from significant corrections to achieve new milestones. As the market matures, with increasing institutional interest and ongoing technological advancements, the long-term outlook for the Bitcoin price remains compelling, albeit with the continued expectation of short-term fluctuations. Stay informed, stay strategic, and approach the crypto market with a well-researched perspective. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Why did the Bitcoin price fall below $118,000? The recent drop in Bitcoin price is likely due to a combination of factors, including broader macroeconomic concerns (like inflation and interest rate hikes), negative market sentiment fueled by regulatory news or FUD, technical breakdowns below key support levels, and potential large sell-offs by significant holders (whales). It‚Äôs rarely a single cause but rather a confluence of these elements. Q2: Is this a good time to buy Bitcoin? Whether it‚Äôs a ‚Äògood‚Äô time to buy depends on your individual financial situation, risk tolerance, and investment strategy. Some investors view significant dips in Bitcoin price as opportunities to ‚Äòbuy the dip‚Äô and accumulate more at a lower cost, especially if they have a long-term belief in Bitcoin‚Äôs value. Others prefer to wait for signs of market stabilization. Strategies like Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) can help mitigate risk by spreading purchases over time. Q3: How does Bitcoin‚Äôs price volatility affect other cryptocurrencies? Bitcoin often acts as the market leader for the broader cryptocurrency space. When the Bitcoin price experiences significant volatility, altcoins (alternative cryptocurrencies) typically follow suit. A sharp drop in Bitcoin often leads to a corresponding decline across most altcoins, while a strong Bitcoin rally can pull the rest of the market up. This correlation is a key characteristic of the crypto market. Q4: What are some common strategies for managing Bitcoin price risk? Key strategies include: 1) Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) to average out your purchase price over time; 2) Setting Stop-Loss Orders to limit potential losses; 3) Diversifying your portfolio beyond just Bitcoin; 4) Only investing what you can afford to lose ; and 5) Conducting thorough research (DYOR) to understand the asset‚Äôs fundamentals. Q5: What is the long-term outlook for Bitcoin‚Äôs price? Despite short-term volatility, the long-term outlook for Bitcoin price remains largely positive for many analysts and investors. This is based on Bitcoin‚Äôs scarcity, its growing adoption as a digital store of value and medium of exchange, increasing institutional interest, and the anticipation of future halving events that reduce new supply. While dips are expected, Bitcoin has historically demonstrated strong resilience and growth over longer periods. Did you find this analysis helpful? Share this article on your social media to help others understand the recent Bitcoin price movements and navigate the crypto market with confidence! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. This post Bitcoin Price Alert: Decoding the Sudden Drop Below $118,000 first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Whales Are Buying This Altcoin Set to Rise 20%, Just as Bitcoin (BTC) Stabilizes Near $120,000 After New ATH
body: Bitcoin (BTC)‚Äôs recent surge to nearly $120,000 has investors buzzing, marking an exciting new all-time high in the crypto world. This milestone signals renewed confidence among large institutional players, who are now beginning to rotate profits into promising altcoins that promise faster, more explosive growth. While Layer-1 blockchains such as Sui focus on technical upgrades like speed and scalability, the financial upside offered by certain altcoins is capturing more attention from savvy investors. One such token is Mutuum Finance (MUTM) , a decentralized lending platform poised to deliver rapid returns that could far outpace slow-moving tech improvements. As whales increase their stakes, MUTM stands out not just for its innovative DeFi protocols but also for its strong presale momentum and well-structured roadmap. Bitcoin (BTC) Stabilizes Bitcoin (BTC) stabilized around $119,750 as of July 21, 2025, after hitting a new all-time high of $123,153 on July 14, driven by $2.7 billion in weekly ETF inflows, per Reuters. BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT ETF, holding over 700,000 BTC, led with $1.18 billion in single-day inflows, boosting institutional demand. The CLARITY Act and pro-crypto policies during ‚ÄúCrypto Week‚Äù fueled optimism, with X posts noting a 13% monthly gain. A bullish three white soldiers pattern targets $125,000-$136,000 by Q4 2025, per Ledn‚Äôs CEO, though an overbought RSI (75) and $445 million in short liquidations suggest a potential dip to $116,500-$117,000. Long-term holder accumulation (250,000 BTC) and rising transactions (364,000 daily) signal sustained momentum, but tariff uncertainties and miner outflows could spark volatility, keeping BTC‚Äôs trajectory in a delicate balance. What Is Mutuum Finance (MUTM)? Mutuum Finance (MUTM) will be a decentralized lending platform built on a fast Layer-2 network, offering two distinct models: Peer-to-Contract (P2C) and Peer-to-Peer (P2P). In the P2C model, users will be able to deposit assets like $28,000 MATIC into a lending pool and earn a projected 13.8% APY‚Äîyielding $3,864 in passive income annually. Borrowers, on the other hand, will be able to put blue-chip tokens such as $2,800 worth of ADA at 70% LTV to instantly borrow $1,960 in USDT, with flexible repayment and no penalties. Meanwhile, the P2P model will support risk-adjusted lending backed by volatile assets like memecoins. Users will negotiate terms directly, unlocking higher yield opportunities with smart contract safeguards. All earnings will be tracked through mtTokens‚ÄîERC-20 tokens that grow in value automatically, can be transferred, and staked for extra rewards via MUTM buybacks. Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äôs presale has attracted tremendous interest, with Phase 5 nearly complete. Out of a total supply of 4 billion MUTM tokens, $12.9 million has been raised, and 90% of tokens allocated in this phase are sold. Over 13,900 holders have secured their positions at the current price of $0.03, just before the next planned price increase to $0.035‚Äîa 20% rise. This rapid token uptake illustrates strong market confidence and positions MUTM as one of the hottest altcoins for investors seeking meaningful returns ahead of the token‚Äôs full launch. Stablecoin Innovation & mtToken Staking Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is developing a decentralized stablecoin designed to maintain a steady $1 value. This stablecoin will only be minted when users borrow against collateral like ETH, and burned upon loan repayment or liquidation. Governance will actively adjust borrowing interest rates to keep the stablecoin price close to its peg, lowering rates if it trades above $1 and raising them if it dips below. This dynamic rate model works alongside natural arbitrage to maintain price stability. Meanwhile, mtTokens generated in lending pools can be staked in designated smart contracts, enabling holders to earn passive income through MUTM buybacks. This mechanism not only incentivizes long-term holding but also adds an extra layer of security and community engagement to the ecosystem. Roadmap Progress and Future Milestones Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has made significant strides since the presale launch. Most of Phase 1, ‚ÄúIntroducing Mutuum Finance (MUTM),‚Äù is complete, including presale initiation, marketing campaigns, giveaway launches, external smart contract audits, token tracking listings, and implementation of an AI-powered helpdesk. Pending items include educational content on Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äôs technology and forming a legal and compliance team. Looking ahead, Phase 2, titled ‚ÄúBuilding Mutuum Finance (MUTM),‚Äù will focus on core smart contract development, DApp front-end and back-end infrastructure setup, introduction of advanced features, and implementation of robust risk parameters. Both internal and external auditors will conduct regular code reviews to ensure security and efficiency. Additionally, Phase 2 will bring advanced analytics tools for improved platform insights. Phases 3 and 4, ‚ÄúFinalizing Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äù and ‚ÄúDelivering Mutuum Finance (MUTM),‚Äù respectively, will see beta testing, launch of the demo version, regulatory alignment, and preparation for exchange listings. The live platform launch, token listing on exchanges, bug bounty program activation, and expansion to multiple blockchain networks are also slated for these stages, along with institutional partnership development and ongoing platform enhancements. This structured roadmap lays a clear path toward a fully functional, secure, and scalable DeFi ecosystem. A notable example of early success comes from a trader who swapped 10 ETH for MUTM tokens during Phase 2 at just $0.015 each. With the token set to list at $0.06, this investor currently sits on a 4x paper gain. Looking ahead, if post-launch demand pushes MUTM toward the projected $0.30 target, that same position could grow to a 20x return. This upside is supported by Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äôs upcoming beta launch, which will activate real-world P2P and P2C lending use cases‚Äîattracting a wider user base and increasing token demand. CertiK Audit & $100K Giveaway Boost Confidence Security is a top priority for Mutuum Finance (MUTM), evidenced by a thorough CertiK audit combining manual code reviews and static analysis. The platform has earned a strong scan score of 95.00 and a Skynet rating of 77.50, underscoring its robust security protocols. Alongside these assurances, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has launched a $100,000 giveaway with ten $10,000 worth of MUTM token prizes, fueling community enthusiasm. The project‚Äôs Twitter following has surpassed 12,000, reflecting an engaged and growing user base ready to support the token‚Äôs journey. With approximately 60 million MUTM tokens remaining at $0.03, this is a final opportunity for investors to secure tokens before the upcoming Phase 6 price jump to $0.035. This 20% increase is locked in and offers immediate upside to those who move swiftly. While Bitcoin (BTC) stabilizes near historic highs, Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äôs innovative DeFi approach and strong presale performance position it to be the next altcoin breakout story. Join the growing community and claim your share before the price advances again. title: Tether Investments: Unveiling a Billion-Dollar Empire‚Äôs Bold Expansion
body: BitcoinWorld Tether Investments: Unveiling a Billion-Dollar Empire‚Äôs Bold Expansion In a move that has sent ripples across the cryptocurrency landscape, Tether, the issuer of the world‚Äôs largest stablecoin USDT, has recently pulled back the curtain on a significant portion of its expansive investment portfolio. This isn‚Äôt just about holding reserves; it‚Äôs about active, strategic deployment of profits into a diverse array of over 120 companies. If you‚Äôve been wondering how a stablecoin giant leverages its financial might beyond just backing its tokens, this revelation about Tether investments offers a fascinating glimpse into its growing influence. What Are Tether Investments Really About? The recent disclosure by Tether‚Äôs CEO, Paolo Ardoino, via a post on X (formerly Twitter), provided a rare look into the company‚Äôs ambitious financial strategy. Ardoino clarified that these substantial investments are not derived from Tether‚Äôs stablecoin reserves‚Äîthe funds specifically held to back USDT and other Tether-issued stablecoins. This is a crucial distinction that underscores the company‚Äôs commitment to maintaining the 1:1 peg of its stablecoins, ensuring their stability and liquidity. Instead, these significant capital allocations are made directly from Tether‚Äôs accumulated profits. And what profits they are! In 2024 alone, Tether reported a staggering $13.7 billion in profits. This immense profitability positions Tether not just as a stablecoin issuer but as a formidable investment entity with considerable financial muscle. The sheer scale of these profits allows Tether to engage in a broad spectrum of ventures, extending its reach far beyond the traditional crypto sphere. The fact that over 120 companies have already received funding highlights a methodical and diversified approach to capital deployment. While specific names of these companies haven‚Äôt been fully disclosed, the sheer number suggests a strategy aimed at fostering innovation and growth across various sectors. This strategic use of profits demonstrates a proactive stance in building and supporting the broader digital economy, rather than merely holding onto cash. The Strategic Vision Behind These Expansive Tether Investments Why would a stablecoin issuer venture into such a wide array of investments? The answer lies in Tether‚Äôs long-term vision and its evolving role in the digital asset ecosystem. These Tether investments are not random; they are part of a calculated strategy designed to achieve several key objectives: Ecosystem Growth and Diversification: By investing in various companies, Tether is actively contributing to the development of new technologies, platforms, and services. This diversification reduces reliance on any single market segment and fosters a more robust and interconnected digital economy. It‚Äôs a way of ‚Äògiving back‚Äô to the ecosystem that has enabled its success, ensuring continued innovation. Future-Proofing and Revenue Streams: As the crypto market matures, companies like Tether are looking beyond their core products to secure future revenue streams. Investments in promising startups and established ventures can yield significant returns, further bolstering Tether‚Äôs financial strength and resilience. This strategy ensures the company remains relevant and profitable in a rapidly evolving landscape. Influence and Strategic Partnerships: Financial investments often come with strategic influence. By backing various companies, Tether can forge partnerships, gain insights into emerging trends, and potentially steer development in directions that align with its broader goals for decentralization and digital financial infrastructure. Supporting Web3 and Emerging Technologies: While the exact sectors aren‚Äôt detailed, it‚Äôs highly probable that many of these investments are directed towards Web3 infrastructure, artificial intelligence, biotechnology, renewable energy, and other cutting-edge fields. This aligns with a broader industry trend of crypto entities supporting the next generation of technological advancements. Paolo Ardoino‚Äôs statement about significantly expanding investments in the coming months and years reinforces this long-term, strategic outlook. It suggests that Tether views its role as a key financial enabler for innovation, leveraging its substantial profits to shape the future of technology and finance. How Do Tether Investments Impact the Crypto Landscape? The extensive nature of Tether investments carries significant implications for the broader cryptocurrency market and beyond. On one hand, there are clear benefits: Stimulating Innovation: Capital injection into over 120 companies, especially those in nascent or high-growth sectors, can accelerate innovation. This funding allows startups to scale, develop new products, and bring groundbreaking ideas to market, ultimately benefiting users and the wider economy. Increased Liquidity and Stability: A financially strong and diversified Tether is beneficial for the stability of USDT, which remains a cornerstone of crypto trading. The ability to generate substantial profits from diversified investments adds another layer of financial robustness to the company, potentially enhancing confidence in its stablecoin. Bridging Traditional and Digital Finance: As Tether invests in a wider array of companies, it naturally bridges the gap between traditional industries and the digital asset space. This cross-pollination can lead to greater adoption of blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies in mainstream applications. However, such expansive financial influence also brings potential challenges and considerations: Centralization Concerns: While Tether champions decentralization, its significant financial power and wide-ranging investments could lead to concerns about centralized influence within the crypto ecosystem. A single entity holding stakes in many key projects might raise questions about market control and competitive fairness. Transparency and Disclosure: While Tether has disclosed the number of companies and the source of funds, the lack of specific details about the recipient companies can lead to calls for greater transparency. For an entity with such systemic importance, more granular disclosures could foster greater trust and accountability. Market Influence: The sheer scale of Tether‚Äôs investment capacity means its decisions could significantly impact the growth trajectories of various sectors. While this can be positive, it also means Tether‚Äôs strategic choices could inadvertently shape market dynamics in powerful ways. Navigating the Future of Tether Investments : What‚Äôs Next? Looking ahead, the trajectory of Tether investments appears to be one of continued expansion and deepening influence. Paolo Ardoino‚Äôs explicit statement about scaling up investments suggests that the current portfolio of 120+ companies is just the beginning. We can anticipate several key developments: Firstly, expect a more pronounced focus on specific strategic sectors. While the current investments are broad, Tether might hone in on areas like AI infrastructure, decentralized physical infrastructure networks (DePIN), biotech advancements, and sustainable energy solutions. These are sectors that align with a vision of a technologically advanced and environmentally conscious future, and where significant capital can drive transformative change. Secondly, the regulatory landscape will undoubtedly play a crucial role. As Tether‚Äôs financial footprint grows, so too will the scrutiny from regulators worldwide. The company‚Äôs ongoing efforts to enhance transparency and comply with global financial standards will be critical in navigating this environment. Clear communication about its investment thesis and the nature of its holdings will be paramount for maintaining trust. Finally, the interplay between these investments and Tether‚Äôs core stablecoin business will be fascinating to observe. While distinct, the success of one can certainly bolster the other. Strong returns from its investment portfolio can further solidify Tether‚Äôs financial position, indirectly strengthening the confidence in USDT, even as the funds remain separate from reserves. This symbiotic relationship could create a powerful feedback loop, driving both innovation and stability. Actionable Insights for the Savvy Investor: Monitor Tether‚Äôs Disclosures: Keep an eye on any further transparency reports or announcements from Tether regarding their investment activities. These can offer clues about emerging trends and sectors they deem promising. Research Potential Beneficiaries: While direct names are scarce, understanding the types of companies Tether might favor (e.g., Web3 infrastructure, AI, biotech) can help identify broader investment themes. Understand the Distinction: Always remember that these investments are from profits, separate from stablecoin reserves. This distinction is vital for assessing USDT‚Äôs stability. A Bold New Era for Crypto Finance Tether‚Äôs revelation about its extensive Tether investments marks a significant moment in the evolution of the cryptocurrency industry. It signifies a shift where major crypto entities are not just building within their immediate domain but are actively shaping the broader technological and economic landscape through strategic capital deployment. This bold expansion, fueled by substantial profits, positions Tether as a formidable player in global finance, with a reach that extends far beyond the stablecoin market. While questions around transparency and centralized influence will undoubtedly persist, the potential for these investments to foster innovation and drive the adoption of new technologies is undeniable. As Tether continues to expand its portfolio, it will be fascinating to witness the impact of its financial might on the companies it supports and the industries it seeks to transform. This is more than just an investment strategy; it‚Äôs a blueprint for a new era of crypto-powered growth. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Are Tether‚Äôs investments part of its stablecoin reserves? No, Tether‚Äôs CEO Paolo Ardoino explicitly stated that these investments are made from Tether‚Äôs accumulated profits, which amounted to $13.7 billion in 2024. These funds are entirely separate from the reserves held to back USDT and other stablecoins, ensuring the 1:1 peg and liquidity of its stablecoins. Q2: How many companies has Tether invested in? Tether has revealed that it has invested in over 120 companies to date. This number is expected to significantly expand in the coming months and years, indicating a long-term strategic investment approach. Q3: Why is Tether making these investments? Tether‚Äôs investments are part of a strategic vision to diversify its revenue streams, foster growth within the broader digital ecosystem, support emerging technologies like Web3 and AI, and potentially gain strategic influence in key sectors. It‚Äôs about leveraging profits to contribute to and benefit from the future of technology and finance. Q4: What kind of companies does Tether invest in? While specific company names haven‚Äôt been fully disclosed, it is highly probable that Tether‚Äôs investments are directed towards sectors aligned with technological advancement and innovation. This likely includes areas such as Web3 infrastructure, artificial intelligence, biotechnology, sustainable energy solutions, and other cutting-edge fields that complement the digital economy. Q5: What are the potential impacts of Tether‚Äôs extensive investment portfolio? The impacts are multifaceted. Positively, these investments can stimulate innovation, increase liquidity, and bridge traditional and digital finance. However, concerns may arise regarding centralized influence within the crypto ecosystem and the need for greater transparency regarding specific holdings, given Tether‚Äôs significant market position. Did you find this deep dive into Tether‚Äôs investment strategy insightful? Share this article with your network on social media to spark conversations about the evolving role of stablecoin issuers in the broader financial landscape! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Tether‚Äôs market influence and institutional adoption . This post Tether Investments: Unveiling a Billion-Dollar Empire‚Äôs Bold Expansion first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: AI predicts Ethereum price for August 1, 2025
body: Ethereum ( ETH ) has been outpacing its competitors in recent weeks thanks to growing institutional interest and exchange-traded fund ( ETF ) inflows. At press time, ETH was trading at $3,674, up almost 62.39% in the past month, with a market cap of approximately $444.54 billion, as per CoinMarketCap . According to Finbold‚Äôs AI price prediction model , ETH price could reach $3,800 by August 31 (a +3.41% increase from the current price). ETH AI price prediction. Source: Finbold The prediction is based on several technical indicators, including the Moving Average Convergence Divergence ( MACD ), Relative Strength Index ( RSI ), Stochastic Oscillator , MACD Slope, and 50-day Simple Moving Average ( SMA ). ETHtechnicals considered by AI. Source: Finbold ETH continues to trade well above its 50-day SMA of $2,752, which suggests the momentum remains broadly bullish . However, the MACD line, standing at 311.498, with a signal line at 250.056 and a positive histogram reading of 61.443, indicates strong underlying buying pressure. Likewise, while the MACD signal line is rising and thus implying continued upward momentum, the MACD histogram slope has flattened to 1.138, hinting that the pace of the momentum is slowing. Short-term indicators are signaling overextension. The 7-day RSI is hovering near 80, down from a high of 87 last month. While still in overbought territory, the declining RSI alongside rising prices points to a bearish divergence often seen as foreboding a consolidation or a pullback. Similarly, the Stochastic Oscillator remains elevated between 83 and 89, further supporting the view that ETH may be nearing a short-term peak. Ethereum trading volume Meanwhile, Ethereum‚Äôs 24-hour trading volume has dropped more than 20%, now sitting at $37.28 billion, according to CoinMarketCap . Total futures open interest (OI), i.e., the total number of active contracts (futures or options) that haven‚Äôt been settled or closed, has also dropped by 3.16% in the past day, as indicated by CoinGlass data. This might signal a short squeeze unwind. Taken alongside the mixed technical indicators, these numbers support a cautiously optimistic outlook and a modest potential upside, as predicted by the AI. Featured image via Shutterstock The post AI predicts Ethereum price for August 1, 2025 appeared first on Finbold .

title: Hungarian Forint‚Äôs Crucial Stability: Central Bank Holds Rates at 6.50%
body: BitcoinWorld Hungarian Forint‚Äôs Crucial Stability: Central Bank Holds Rates at 6.50% In the dynamic world of finance, where every central bank decision sends ripples across markets, the recent announcement from Hungary‚Äôs National Bank regarding the Hungarian Forint has captured attention. For anyone tracking global macro trends, understanding these pivotal moments is key, as they often signal broader economic health and future movements, even influencing the cryptocurrency landscape indirectly by shaping investor sentiment and liquidity. The Hungarian National Bank (MNB) has opted to maintain its benchmark interest rate at 6.50%, a decision that reflects a calculated approach to managing inflation and fostering currency stability. What‚Äôs Driving the Hungarian Forint‚Äôs Current Trajectory? The Hungarian Forint has been on a journey marked by both volatility and periods of resilience. Its performance is often influenced by a complex interplay of domestic and international factors. Domestically, inflation rates, government fiscal policy, and economic growth figures play a significant role. Internationally, global commodity prices, particularly energy, and the broader geopolitical landscape can exert considerable pressure on the Forint‚Äôs value. The MNB‚Äôs recent decision to hold rates steady signals a belief that current monetary conditions are appropriate for guiding the Forint towards a more predictable path. Historically, the Forint has faced challenges from high inflation and external imbalances. However, recent policy actions by the MNB have aimed at taming price pressures and stabilizing the currency. This latest hold at 6.50% suggests that the central bank sees the current policy stance as effective in balancing the need for disinflation with supporting economic activity. Investors and market watchers are closely observing how this stability will translate into long-term confidence in the Hungarian economy. How Does the Central Bank‚Äôs Decision Influence Your Finances? The role of a Central Bank like the MNB extends far beyond setting interest rates; it acts as the guardian of a nation‚Äôs financial stability. Its decisions directly impact borrowing costs, savings returns, and the overall economic environment. For individuals, this means the cost of mortgages, personal loans, and even the returns on savings accounts are influenced by the central bank‚Äôs actions. For businesses, it affects the cost of capital, investment decisions, and ultimately, job creation. When the Central Bank maintains rates, it signals a period of predictability. This can be beneficial for planning and investment, as the cost of money remains constant. Here‚Äôs how a central bank‚Äôs rate decision can ripple through the economy: Borrowing Costs: Stable rates mean consistent costs for loans, from home mortgages to business credit. Savings Returns: Interest earned on deposits tends to align with the central bank‚Äôs benchmark rate, offering predictable returns for savers. Investment Climate: Predictable interest rate environments can encourage long-term investment by reducing uncertainty for businesses. Currency Value: Stable rates can contribute to a more stable currency value, impacting import and export prices. Inflation Expectations: A consistent monetary policy helps anchor inflation expectations, which is crucial for price stability. Decoding the 6.50% Interest Rates : A Deep Dive into MNB‚Äôs Stance The decision to maintain Interest Rates at 6.50% is not made in a vacuum. It reflects the MNB‚Äôs assessment of current economic conditions, including inflation trends, economic growth forecasts, and external risks. This specific rate is considered a neutral stance, neither overly restrictive nor overly accommodative, designed to continue the disinflationary process while avoiding a sharp economic downturn. The MNB has been proactive in its efforts to combat inflation, which soared in recent years. The current 6.50% rate is a significant step down from previous, much higher levels, indicating that the central bank believes the peak of inflation has passed and that price pressures are now moderating. The focus has shifted from aggressive tightening to carefully managing the economy‚Äôs transition to a lower inflation environment. This sustained period of steady Interest Rates is intended to provide a stable foundation for businesses and consumers to plan their financial futures. To put the MNB‚Äôs recent rate decisions into perspective, consider the following: Date of Decision Base Rate Action Primary Rationale (Simplified) March 2024 8.25% Cut Continued disinflation, supporting economy April 2024 7.75% Cut Further disinflationary trends May 2024 7.25% Cut Achieving inflation target sustainably June 2024 6.50% Cut Sustained decline in inflation July 2024 6.50% Hold Maintaining price stability, assessing global risks Is Hungary‚Äôs Current Monetary Policy Steering Towards Long-Term Stability? The MNB‚Äôs current Monetary Policy stance, characterized by a steady 6.50% rate, aims to anchor long-term inflation expectations and foster sustainable economic growth. This policy framework involves not just interest rates but also liquidity management and communication strategies to guide market behavior. The central bank is navigating a complex global environment, including ongoing geopolitical tensions and fluctuating energy prices, which could impact Hungary‚Äôs economic outlook. A key challenge for any central bank is balancing the need to control inflation with the imperative to support economic activity. An overly tight Monetary Policy can stifle growth, while a too-loose approach can reignite inflation. The MNB‚Äôs decision to hold rates suggests confidence in the current trajectory of disinflation and a cautious approach to further easing, ensuring that past gains in price stability are not jeopardized. This strategic patience is crucial for building a foundation for robust economic performance in the years ahead. What Are the Prospects for Hungary‚Äôs Economic Stability Going Forward? The MNB‚Äôs decision is a significant factor in shaping Hungary‚Äôs future Economic Stability . A stable currency and predictable interest rate environment are fundamental for attracting foreign investment, encouraging domestic consumption, and supporting business expansion. However, Hungary‚Äôs economic stability also depends on several other factors: Fiscal Policy: The government‚Äôs budget management and spending priorities will play a crucial role alongside monetary policy. Global Economic Environment: The health of the global economy, particularly the Eurozone, directly impacts Hungary‚Äôs export-oriented sectors. Energy Prices: As an energy importer, Hungary remains vulnerable to fluctuations in global energy markets. Labor Market Dynamics: Wage growth and employment levels are key indicators of domestic demand and inflation pressures. While challenges persist, the MNB‚Äôs commitment to maintaining rate stability provides a strong signal of its dedication to a predictable economic future. This stability can bolster investor confidence, leading to increased capital inflows and fostering a more resilient economy. The current policy aims to create an environment where businesses can plan with greater certainty, and consumers can make spending decisions with more confidence, contributing to overall national prosperity. Actionable Insights for Investors and Businesses For investors, particularly those with exposure to emerging markets or an interest in the broader macroeconomic landscape affecting cryptocurrency, the MNB‚Äôs stable rate decision offers several insights: Monitor MNB Communications: Future statements from the central bank will provide clues about their forward guidance and potential shifts in policy. Assess Relative Yields: Compare Hungarian bond yields with those in other regions to understand the attractiveness of Forint-denominated assets. Diversify Portfolios: While stability is welcome, diversification across different asset classes and geographies remains a prudent strategy. Understand Inflation Trends: Keep an eye on Hungary‚Äôs inflation data; persistent high inflation could pressure the MNB to reconsider its stance. For businesses operating in or considering Hungary, the consistent interest rate environment can facilitate better financial planning and investment decisions. Stable borrowing costs reduce uncertainty, making it easier to project profitability and expand operations. This predictability can also make Hungary a more attractive destination for foreign direct investment. A Foundation for Future Growth The Hungarian National Bank‚Äôs decision to hold its base rate at 6.50% marks a significant moment in its journey towards achieving lasting price stability and fostering a robust economy. This move signals a confident, yet cautious, approach, allowing the effects of previous rate hikes to fully transmit through the economy while providing a stable anchor for the Hungarian Forint . It is a testament to the MNB‚Äôs commitment to steering the nation through complex economic waters, aiming for a future characterized by sustained growth and reduced inflationary pressures. As global markets continue to evolve, Hungary‚Äôs steady hand on its Monetary Policy provides a crucial foundation for its ongoing Economic Stability and resilience. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping interest rates and global liquidity. title: Grupo Murano‚Äôs Bold $1‚ÄØB Bitcoin Leap
body: Grupo Murano, a major Mexican real estate and hospitality firm, is reinventing its finance model. Instead of relying solely on traditional assets, they're converting properties into Bitcoin to build a sizeable crypto treasury‚Äîtargeting $10‚ÄØbillion in BTC holdings over the next five years. The plan involves refinancing or selling assets and using sale-leaseback deals to free up capital. Management believes Bitcoin offers better returns than slow‚Äëgrowing buildings, helping protect against volatile interest and inflation rates. They‚Äôve already taken the first step, deploying up to $500‚ÄØmillion via an equity facility and grabbing an initial 21‚ÄØBTC. Murano also joined the ‚ÄúBitcoin for Corporations‚Äù initiative, showing serious commitment to digital assets Beyond treasury building, they‚Äôre exploring real‚Äëworld crypto use: accepting BTC payments, loyalty rewards, installing Bitcoin ATMs in hotels, and hosting related events

title: Bitcoin News Today: On‚ÄëChain Metrics Hint at Next Wave of Selling Pressure
body: The post Bitcoin News Today: On‚ÄëChain Metrics Hint at Next Wave of Selling Pressure appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Bitcoin is once again showing signs of entering a strong rally, but this time, the signals are coming from its on-chain data rather than just price action. Bitcoin‚Äôs hidden supply is waking up again, and it could mean something big for what‚Äôs next. Verified CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. recently highlighted fresh signs in Bitcoin‚Äôs % Supply Active chart that could tell us where this market is headed next. So, what‚Äôs happening? Bitcoin Supply Sharply Increased CryptoQuant‚Äôs verified on-chain analyst Axel Adler Jr. says the share of Bitcoin‚Äôs active supply in the past 180 days is starting to rise. When this number goes up, it means coins that were sitting still for months or even years are now moving again. This usually points to more selling or holders spreading out their coins as prices go higher. This could mean the market is getting ready for an early wave of selling, which might help push Bitcoin‚Äôs next move past $120,000. The share of coins active over the last 180 days (%‚ÄØSupply‚ÄØActive) sharply increased twice in past macro cycles: first to 20‚ÄØ% when BTC climbed to $70,000 in spring‚ÄØ2024, and then in December‚ÄØ2024 to 18‚ÄØ% upon the first breach of the psychological $100,000 mark. This‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/krgvTcoxvL ‚Äî Axel Adler Jr (@AxelAdlerJr) July 23, 2025 Key Supply Activity Trends Looking back, we can see that big jumps in supply activity often went hand in hand with big price moves. For example, in spring 2024, Bitcoin climbed to about $70,000, and at the same time, supply activity rose to 20%, showing that many long-term holders were taking profits. A few months later, in December 2024, supply activity rose again to 18% when Bitcoin broke through the key $100,000 mark for the first time. Now, in June 2025, we see the same trend starting but with one big difference. Even though Bitcoin is steady around $100,000, the latest data shows supply activity has only gone up slightly, from negative levels to about +2.4% in the last 30 days. Compared to past cycles, this is still low, a sign that many holders are not yet ready to sell big chunks of their stash. Early Stages of Distribution Meanwhile, Adler points out that this small rise means we are likely still early in this market cycle. If Bitcoin holds strong and pushes above $120,000, the % Supply Active could slowly climb into the 8%‚Äì10% range first, then maybe back to the 18%‚Äì20% peaks seen in past big rallies. As of now, Bitcoin‚Äôs price is around $118,176 , slightly down in the last 24 hours. But with a market cap near $2.35 trillion, the stage looks set for more action ahead.

title: CryptoPunks Unleash Surprising Potential: Why Arthur Hayes Predicts They‚Äôll Outperform Ethereum
body: BitcoinWorld CryptoPunks Unleash Surprising Potential: Why Arthur Hayes Predicts They‚Äôll Outperform Ethereum The crypto world is buzzing with a bold prediction from BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes: CryptoPunks , the iconic NFTs, will outperform Ethereum (ETH) in dollar terms this cycle. This isn‚Äôt just market speculation; it‚Äôs a deep dive into the psychology of wealth and status in the digital age. Could these pixelated collectibles truly become the ultimate ‚Äòflex‚Äô for crypto millionaires? Why Arthur Hayes Sees CryptoPunks Dominating the Cycle Arthur Hayes‚Äôs core argument centers on the ‚Äòdigital status game.‚Äô He believes that as Ethereum holders accumulate significant wealth, they‚Äôll seek ways to display it. Historically, the wealthy invest in art and luxury. In Web3, Hayes posits that CryptoPunks serve this purpose. Key points from Hayes: Desire for Distinction: As ETH becomes common, wealthy holders seek more exclusive, visual assets. Digital Scarcity: Only 10,000 unique CryptoPunks exist, making them rare status symbols. The ‚ÄòFlex‚Äô Factor: Owning a rare Punk publicly declares wealth and early crypto adoption. Hayes suggests this human need for status will drive capital from ETH into high-tier NFTs like CryptoPunks , leading to faster appreciation. Understanding the Allure of CryptoPunks: More Than Just JPEGs To understand Hayes‚Äôs prediction, recognize CryptoPunks ‚Äò unique position. Launched in 2017 by Larva Labs, they are OGs of the NFT space, representing a milestone in blockchain history and digital ownership. Their desirability stems from: Historical Significance: One of the first, most influential NFT projects. Fixed Supply: A strict 10,000 Punk limit ensures rarity. Recognizable Brand: Their pixelated aesthetic is instantly iconic. Community: Owning a Punk grants access to an exclusive, pioneering legacy. Few other collections match CryptoPunks ‚Äò blend of history, scarcity, and cultural cachet, making them potent digital status symbols. Ethereum‚Äôs Role in the NFT Ecosystem: A Foundation for CryptoPunks‚Äô Success While Hayes predicts CryptoPunks will outperform ETH, Ethereum remains the vital foundation for the NFT ecosystem. It provides the robust, decentralized infrastructure for minting, trading, and verifying digital asset ownership. Ethereum‚Äôs crucial role: Smart Contracts: Enable secure NFT creation and transfer. Network Effect: Large user and developer base makes it the preferred NFT blockchain. Liquidity: ETH is the primary trading pair, ensuring seamless transactions. Without Ethereum‚Äôs strength, the digital status game built on NFTs like CryptoPunks would be far less compelling. ETH is the bedrock. Navigating the Challenges: Risks and Volatility in the CryptoPunks Market Despite the allure of CryptoPunks , understanding inherent risks and volatility is crucial. No investment in crypto is without challenges. Key considerations for potential investors: Market Liquidity: Selling high-value Punks quickly at desired prices can be difficult. Subjective Valuation: NFT value is largely subjective, driven by sentiment and perceived rarity. Bear Market Impact: NFTs often see significant corrections during broader crypto downturns. Security Risks: Owning NFTs demands careful private key and wallet management. Potential outperformance comes with substantial risk. Due diligence and strong risk management are paramount for CryptoPunks investments. Is Your Portfolio Ready for CryptoPunks? Actionable Insights If Arthur Hayes‚Äôs prediction has sparked interest in adding CryptoPunks to your portfolio, careful consideration is vital. This isn‚Äôt a buy recommendation, but a guide for informed decision-making. Actionable insights: Research Extensively: Understand CryptoPunks ‚Äò history, rarity, and market dynamics. Assess Risk Tolerance: NFTs are highly volatile; invest only what you can afford to lose. Diversify: A mix of cryptocurrencies and other assets is generally a sound strategy. Long-Term Vision: For status symbols, a long-term holding strategy might be suitable. Investing in high-value NFTs like CryptoPunks requires market understanding, risk awareness, and a clear investment thesis. The Digital Status Game: A New Era of Wealth Display Arthur Hayes‚Äôs ‚Äòdigital status game‚Äô theory offers a fascinating view of the evolving crypto landscape. As individuals accumulate significant DeFi wealth, their natural inclination to display it will manifest in unique digital forms. Just as physical art signifies success, NFTs like CryptoPunks are emerging as the Web3 equivalent. This isn‚Äôt just about financial gain; it‚Äôs about belonging, recognition, and visual representation of one‚Äôs position in a rapidly expanding digital society. This cultural shift, driven by human psychology, could be a powerful catalyst for premier digital collectibles. Conclusion: Beyond the Hype ‚Äì The Enduring Appeal of CryptoPunks Arthur Hayes‚Äôs bold prediction about CryptoPunks outperforming Ethereum invites us to consider deeper value drivers in the digital age. While Ethereum remains crypto‚Äôs backbone, the human desire for status may propel iconic NFTs like Punks to new heights. Their historical significance, scarcity, and cultural resonance uniquely position them as the ultimate digital flex. However, risks are inherent. As the crypto market matures, the interplay between foundational assets like ETH and culturally significant collectibles like CryptoPunks will shape future narratives. This conversation highlights human psychology‚Äôs profound impact on market dynamics. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Who is Arthur Hayes and why is his prediction significant? A1: Arthur Hayes, BitMEX co-founder, is an influential crypto figure. His predictions are significant due to his deep market understanding and insights into human psychology in finance. Q2: What does Arthur Hayes mean by the ‚Äòdigital status game‚Äô? A2: It‚Äôs the idea that wealthy crypto holders will display prosperity via exclusive digital assets. CryptoPunks are seen as prime examples due to their scarcity and history. Q3: How can CryptoPunks outperform Ethereum if they run on Ethereum? A3: ‚ÄòOutperforming‚Äô means their dollar value appreciation rate could exceed Ethereum‚Äôs. ETH provides infrastructure, but specific demand for scarce CryptoPunks can drive their individual prices faster. Q4: What are the main risks associated with investing in CryptoPunks ? A4: Risks include high market volatility, subjective valuation, potential illiquidity, security risks, and evolving regulatory uncertainties in the NFT market. Share Your Thoughts! If Arthur Hayes‚Äôs insights on CryptoPunks and the digital status game resonated with you, share this article with your network! Spark a conversation about the future of digital wealth and the fascinating psychology behind our investments. Your friends and followers will thank you for the intriguing read! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action . This post CryptoPunks Unleash Surprising Potential: Why Arthur Hayes Predicts They‚Äôll Outperform Ethereum first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Cardano (ADA) Price Predictions for This Week
