However, Bitcoin‚Äôs future market potential entirely depends on its buying demand, regulation, and investor sentiment regarding long-term holdings. Crypto analysts provide a positive sentiment as macroeconomic trends turn promising. We expect Bitcoin price to surpass a high of $216,000 by the end of 2027. Bitcoin historic price sentiment BTC price history: Coinmarketcap Satoshi Nakamoto created Bitcoin in 2009, marking the first use of blockchain technology. Bitcoin was initially of little value, gaining significant traction and hitting over $15,000 during the 2017 boom, with further highs reached in 2019 and 2021. In 2021, Bitcoin peaked at $68,789.63 but dropped to $15,760 by December 2022 amid economic pressures, including inflation and geopolitical conflicts. By April 10, 2023, Bitcoin‚Äôs price surged 83%, breaking the $30,000 resistance level. Throughout mid-2023, Bitcoin‚Äôs value hovered around $30,000, nearly reaching $32,000 due to positive market sentiments and potential ETF approvals. Bitcoin experienced a significant price drop in mid-August 2023, falling to $25,000. However, its prices remained volatile, fluctuating between $26,000 and $29,500 in October. Bitcoin closed 2023 above $42,000, a 155% increase from the year‚Äôs start. In early 2024, Bitcoin rose above $45,000 on ETF anticipation but briefly dipped below $40,000 after approvals. It broke its 2021 all-time high in March, reaching $73,750.07 on March 14, before dropping below $60,000 in April. May saw another surge above $70,000, while June and July brought heavy fluctuations between $70K and $55K. Bitcoin rallied to $66K in September after a Fed rate cut, climbed to $70K in October‚Äôs Uptober rally, and surged toward $108K following Donald Trump‚Äôs victory in the November US elections. BTC ended 2024 consolidating below $95K. At the start of January 2025, BTC was trading between $92,788.13 and $95,824.39. However, it formed an ATH at $109,114 on January 20. In the weeks of February, the price of BTC dropped heavily as it dropped toward the $78K low. In March, the price of Bitcoin declined heavily and dropped toward a low of $76.6K. In April, the price of Bitcoin started recovering. By the end of April, it neared the critical $95K zone. In May, Bitcoin price skyrocketed and it formed a new ATH at $111,970. However, the price declined later, toward $104K. By the end of June, BTC price reclaimed the $108K level.

title: Unveiling Jim Cramer‚Äôs Bold Bitcoin & Ether Bet for His Kids
body: BitcoinWorld Unveiling Jim Cramer‚Äôs Bold Bitcoin & Ether Bet for His Kids The financial world often buzzes with pronouncements from seasoned experts, but few spark as much debate and amusement as those from CNBC‚Äôs Mad Money host, Jim Cramer. In a move that has certainly turned heads, Jim Cramer recently declared his surprising desire to hold Bitcoin (BTC) and Ether (ETH) for his children, viewing them as a crucial hedge against burgeoning U.S. debt. This statement is particularly intriguing given Cramer‚Äôs well-known, and sometimes contrarian, market forecasting track record. But what exactly drives this unexpected pivot towards digital assets, and what does it mean for the broader discussion around cryptocurrency as a legitimate investment for the future? Why Jim Cramer Sees Bitcoin and Ether as a Hedge? Jim Cramer‚Äôs rationale for embracing digital assets like Bitcoin and Ether is rooted in a fundamental concern about the future of traditional finance, specifically the escalating U.S. national debt. A ‚Äúhedge‚Äù in financial terms is an investment intended to offset potential losses or gains that may be incurred by a companion investment. In this context, Cramer views Bitcoin and Ether as potential safeguards against the devaluation of fiat currency and the erosion of purchasing power that could result from unchecked government spending and increasing debt burdens. Inflationary Pressures: As national debt grows, governments may resort to printing more money, which can lead to inflation. Cryptocurrencies, particularly Bitcoin with its capped supply, are often seen as a hedge against inflation, similar to gold. Decentralization: Unlike traditional currencies controlled by central banks, Bitcoin and Ether operate on decentralized networks, making them less susceptible to government interference or policy shifts that could impact their value. Store of Value: Proponents argue that Bitcoin, often dubbed ‚Äúdigital gold,‚Äù serves as a robust store of value due to its scarcity and global accessibility, preserving wealth across generations. Long-Term Vision: Cramer‚Äôs emphasis on holding these assets for his children underscores a long-term investment perspective, suggesting he believes in their enduring value proposition beyond short-term market volatility. This perspective aligns with a growing sentiment among some investors who are seeking alternatives to traditional assets in an increasingly uncertain economic landscape. The idea that digital assets could serve as a modern-day financial ark against the flood of national debt is gaining traction, even if the volatility of these assets remains a significant consideration. The Jim Cramer Effect: Navigating Market Predictions Jim Cramer is undeniably a polarizing figure in financial media. His enthusiastic, often theatrical, market predictions have earned him a loyal following, but also a reputation for being a ‚Äúcontra-indicator.‚Äù This phenomenon, humorously dubbed the ‚ÄúJim Cramer effect,‚Äù suggests that the opposite of his predictions often comes true. This makes his recent endorsement of Jim Cramer Bitcoin and Ether all the more fascinating for observers. For years, Cramer has offered advice across various asset classes, from stocks to commodities. While he has had notable successes, some of his more high-profile calls have famously gone awry, leading to the creation of inverse Cramer ETFs and online memes. This history prompts a critical question: should investors take his crypto endorsement seriously, or is it another signal to do the opposite? It‚Äôs crucial to differentiate between an individual‚Äôs personal investment philosophy and general market advice. Cramer‚Äôs decision to hold Bitcoin and Ether for his children speaks to his personal conviction about long-term wealth preservation, rather than a short-term trading tip. His evolving stance on cryptocurrencies also reflects a broader shift in mainstream financial perception, where once-skeptical figures are beginning to acknowledge the potential of digital assets. Ultimately, the ‚ÄúJim Cramer effect‚Äù serves as a reminder for all investors to conduct their own thorough research and not rely solely on any single personality‚Äôs pronouncements, regardless of their prominence. Personal financial decisions, especially regarding volatile assets like cryptocurrencies, should always be based on individual risk tolerance, financial goals, and independent analysis. Understanding Digital Assets: Bitcoin and Ether‚Äôs Role To fully grasp Jim Cramer‚Äôs interest, it‚Äôs essential to understand what Bitcoin and Ether are and why they stand out in the vast digital asset landscape. Both are foundational cryptocurrencies, but they serve different, albeit sometimes overlapping, purposes. Bitcoin (BTC): The Pioneer Digital Gold Scarcity: Capped supply of 21 million coins, making it deflationary by design. Decentralization: Operates on a proof-of-work blockchain, secured by a global network of miners. Primary Use Case: Primarily functions as a store of value and a medium of exchange. It‚Äôs often compared to digital gold due to its scarcity and perceived hedge properties against inflation and economic uncertainty. Ether (ETH): The Fuel for Decentralized Applications Smart Contracts: Powers the Ethereum blockchain, which enables smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps). Utility: ETH is used to pay for transaction fees (gas) on the Ethereum network and is central to the DeFi (Decentralized Finance) and NFT (Non-Fungible Token) ecosystems. Evolving Supply: While not capped like Bitcoin, Ethereum‚Äôs transition to Proof-of-Stake (the Merge) and subsequent upgrades have introduced deflationary mechanisms, making its supply more dynamic. Here‚Äôs a simplified comparison: Feature Bitcoin (BTC) Ether (ETH) Primary Purpose Store of Value, Digital Gold Utility, Fuel for dApps, DeFi, NFTs Consensus Mechanism Proof-of-Work (PoW) Proof-of-Stake (PoS) Supply Cap 21 Million No fixed cap, but deflationary mechanisms Innovation Focus Security, Scarcity, Decentralization Scalability, Programmability, Ecosystem Development Both assets represent significant innovations in finance and technology. Jim Cramer‚Äôs interest in both suggests a recognition of their distinct yet complementary roles in a diversified digital asset portfolio, particularly one aimed at long-term wealth preservation. Is Jim Cramer‚Äôs Crypto Vision Right for Your Family? Actionable Insights While Jim Cramer‚Äôs personal conviction about holding Bitcoin and Ether for his children is noteworthy, it prompts a broader question for every individual and family: are digital assets a suitable addition to your long-term investment strategy? The decision to invest in cryptocurrencies should be approached with caution, comprehensive research, and a clear understanding of the associated risks and potential benefits. Benefits of Considering Crypto as a Long-Term Asset: Potential for High Returns: Historically, cryptocurrencies have offered significant returns, though past performance is not indicative of future results. Diversification: They can offer diversification from traditional asset classes, as their price movements may not always correlate with stocks or bonds. Technological Advancement: Investing in crypto is also an investment in a burgeoning technology that could reshape global finance and digital interactions. Challenges and Risks to Be Aware Of: Volatility: Cryptocurrencies are known for extreme price swings, which can lead to substantial losses. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for crypto is still evolving globally, posing risks for investors. Security Concerns: Digital assets are susceptible to hacking, fraud, and loss if not stored securely. Complexity: Understanding the underlying technology and market dynamics can be challenging for new investors. Actionable Insights for Your Investment Journey: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Never invest based solely on celebrity endorsements. Understand the technology, market cap, use cases, and risks of any crypto asset. Start Small: Begin with a small percentage of your overall portfolio that you are comfortable losing. Long-Term Horizon: If you‚Äôre considering crypto as a hedge, adopt a long-term investment mindset to ride out short-term volatility. Secure Your Assets: Use reputable exchanges and consider hardware wallets for significant holdings. Stay Informed: The crypto space evolves rapidly. Continuously educate yourself on market trends, technological developments, and regulatory changes. Consult a Financial Advisor: For personalized advice tailored to your financial situation and risk tolerance, seek guidance from a qualified financial professional. Jim Cramer‚Äôs endorsement is a sign of growing mainstream acceptance, but it should serve as a starting point for your own diligent exploration, not as a definitive guide. Investing for your children‚Äôs future requires a thoughtful and responsible approach, prioritizing education and risk management above all else. Summary: Jim Cramer‚Äôs surprising revelation about wanting to hold Bitcoin and Ether for his children as a hedge against U.S. debt highlights a fascinating intersection of traditional finance and the burgeoning digital asset space. While Cramer‚Äôs market predictions often invite skepticism, his personal long-term conviction underscores a growing narrative around cryptocurrencies as potential safeguards against economic uncertainty. Both Bitcoin and Ether offer distinct value propositions, from Bitcoin‚Äôs role as digital gold to Ether‚Äôs utility in decentralized ecosystems. However, for any investor, particularly those considering digital assets for their family‚Äôs future, thorough research, understanding of volatility and risks, and a long-term perspective are paramount. Ultimately, Cramer‚Äôs move serves as a powerful catalyst for a broader discussion on how digital assets might fit into a diversified portfolio aimed at preserving wealth across generations. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Why does Jim Cramer believe Bitcoin and Ether are a hedge against U.S. debt? A1: Jim Cramer views Bitcoin and Ether as decentralized assets with limited or evolving supply, offering a potential hedge against inflation and currency devaluation that could arise from increasing U.S. national debt and government spending. Q2: What is the ‚ÄúJim Cramer effect‚Äù and how does it relate to his crypto endorsement? A2: The ‚ÄúJim Cramer effect‚Äù refers to the humorous observation that his market predictions sometimes act as contra-indicators. His crypto endorsement is notable because it represents a personal, long-term investment philosophy rather than a short-term trading tip, prompting investors to consider their own research. Q3: How do Bitcoin and Ether differ as investments? A3: Bitcoin (BTC) is primarily seen as a store of value (‚Äúdigital gold‚Äù) due to its scarcity. Ether (ETH) is the utility token of the Ethereum network, powering smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps), making it central to the DeFi and NFT ecosystems. Q4: Is investing in Bitcoin and Ether for my children a good idea? A4: While cryptocurrencies offer potential for high returns and diversification, they are highly volatile and carry significant risks. It‚Äôs crucial to conduct thorough research, understand the risks, start with a small amount, and consider consulting a financial advisor before making such long-term investment decisions for your family. Q5: What are the main risks of investing in cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ether? A5: Key risks include extreme price volatility, evolving regulatory landscapes, potential security vulnerabilities (hacking, fraud), and the complexity of understanding the underlying technology. Investors should be prepared for the possibility of substantial losses. If you found this article insightful, consider sharing it with your friends, family, and social media networks. Let‚Äôs foster a more informed discussion about the future of finance and the role of digital assets! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption . This post Unveiling Jim Cramer‚Äôs Bold Bitcoin & Ether Bet for His Kids first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: BTC Holds Above $118,000 But $120,000 A Bridge Too Far For Now
body: Bitcoin (BTC) has maintained its position above $118,000 despite facing selling pressure over the weekend and dropping to a low of $116,144 earlier this week. The flagship cryptocurrency rallied to reclaim $118,000 and reach $119,980 on Tuesday. However, it could not cross $120,000 and retreated during the ongoing session. BTC is down 1.48% during the ongoing session, trading around $118,201. Bitcoin ETFs Snap 12-Day Inflow Streak Spot Bitcoin ETFs broke their 12-day inflow streak amid profit-taking, registering a net outflow of $131.5 million on Monday. The 12-day inflow streak had seen investors pour $6.6 billion into the ETFs. ARK Invest saw the largest outflow, shedding $77.6 million, followed by Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC, which registered $36.7 million worth of inflows. Meanwhile, Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC registered outflows of around $12.75 million. Bitwise‚Äôs BITB and VanEck‚Äôs HODL also registered nominal outflows of $1.91 million and $2.48 million. Meanwhile, BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT did not register any inflows or outflows. The cumulative net inflows stand at a healthy $54.62 billion, while total net assets across all spot Bitcoin ETFs stand at $151 billion, 6.52% of Bitcoin‚Äôs total market capitalization. The outflows came as investors and institutions locked in their profits to manage risk. Vincent Liu, chief investment officer at Kronos Research, stated, ‚ÄúThe recent ETF outflows reflect profit-taking near the highs and measured institutional rebalancing to lock in gains.‚Äù Strategy Owns 3% of Bitcoin (BTC) Supply Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy owns 3% of the Bitcoin (BTC) supply after completing its latest purchase of the asset earlier this week. The firm announced its latest purchase earlier this week, acquiring 6,220 BTC for $739 million, taking its total Bitcoin holdings to 607,770 BTC , worth $72 billion at current prices. Strategy has used a combination of common and preferred shares, along with debt, to fund its Bitcoin purchases. The company began accumulating the asset in late 2020 as a hedge against inflation. In a separate announcement, Strategy stated that it planned to offer 5 million variable-rate Series A perpetual Stretch preferred shares to finance future Bitcoin purchases. Bitcoin (BTC) Unlikely To Hit $200,000 In 2025 Glassnode lead analyst James Check believes Bitcoin is unlikely to reach $200,000 this year as buying volume is not increasing enough to push prices higher. The observation comes amid several industry executives predicting a rally to $200,000. Check stated in an interview, ‚ÄúHow on earth can we be going up when there is no volume? $200,000 in six months is a big move ‚Äî that‚Äôs a big move.‚Äù Check added that a rally would double Bitcoin‚Äôs current market capitalization of around $2.38 trillion. However, he said he does not see such a move materializing until volumes increase. ‚ÄúCould it happen? Absolutely. Is it likely to happen? Very improbable. Until I see that volume kick in, until I feel a bit more confident, I am certainly not going to put on any levered positions. I‚Äôm probably not going to go out on the risk curve until I see that the market is stabilized.‚Äù Bitcoin (BTC) Price Analysis Bitcoin (BTC) failed to reclaim $120,000 on Tuesday despite building on Monday‚Äôs positive start. The flagship cryptocurrency rallied to an intraday high of $119,603 on Monday before losing momentum and settling at $117,387. Bullish sentiment intensified on Tuesday as BTC rose over 2%, crossing $119,000. However, it fell short of the $120,000 mark, settling at $119,980 before declining during the ongoing session. While BTC continues consolidating below $120,000, market analysts believe the bull cycle has some way to run. According to analytics firm Bitcoin Vector, although momentum has slowed, on-chain metrics indicate that the bullish structure remains intact. The firm stated in a post on X, ‚ÄúMomentum has cooled, but structure and fundamentals remain solid. This isn‚Äôt a top. It‚Äôs a coiled setup with support beneath it.‚Äù Bitcoin Vector explained that with the BTC price compressed, fundamentals have paused and are not weakening. Buyers could simply be waiting for confirmation of the breakout. Meanwhile, Swissblock analyzed Bitcoin‚Äôs short-term holder (STH) cost basis, stating that STHs were active and not exhausted. The STH cost basis is the average purchase price of investors who have held BTC for less than 155 days. According to Swissblocks, the price reached the ‚Äúheated‚Äù band of this metric on July 14, but did not push into the overheated zone. Swissblock added, ‚ÄúProfit-taking is present, but the STH risk zone at $138K hasn‚Äôt been reached. This suggests there's still room for expansion before we see any panic selling or euphoria.‚Äù BTC ended the previous weekend in positive territory, rising nearly 2% to $118,626. It soared past $120,000 on Monday, surging to a new all-time high of $123,091 before declining and settling at $119,716, ultimately registering a 0.92% increase. BTC lost momentum on Tuesday as traders began locking in their gains. As a result, it fell almost 2%, dropping to a low of $115,701 before settling at $117,682. The price recovered on Wednesday, rising 0.82% to reclaim $118,000 and settle at $118,641. BTC encountered volatility on Thursday as buyers and sellers struggled to establish control. Buyers ultimately gained the upper hand as the price rose 0.39% to cross $119,000 and settle at $119,101. Source: TradingView Selling pressure returned on Friday as BTC fell 1.03% to $117,877. The price remained bearish over the weekend, registering a marginal decline on Saturday and dropping 0.48% on Sunday to settle at $117,240. BTC reached an intraday high of $119,603 on Monday, making a positive start to the week. However, it lost momentum after reaching this level and settled at $117,397, ultimately registering a marginal increase. Bullish sentiment intensified on Tuesday as BTC rallied, rising over 2% to settle at $119,980. The current session sees BTC down almost 2%, trading around $117,940. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: MoonPay Execs Caught in Trump-Linked $250K Crypto Scam ‚Äì Why Did DOJ Seal the Case?
body: A federal cryptocurrency fraud case with unexpected ties to Donald Trump‚Äôs circle and senior MoonPay executives has become a legal spectacle after it was briefly sealed in full, then swiftly unsealed, with acting U.S. Attorney Jeanine Pirro blaming court clerks for the confusion. The case, originally filed publicly by the Department of Justice (DOJ) on July 11, was accompanied by a press release outlining charges against a Nigerian national accused of impersonating Steve Witkoff , a prominent real estate figure and co-chair of Trump‚Äôs inaugural committee, to convince two victims to transfer $250,000 worth of Ethereum. But hours later, the entire docket vanished from public view. A Nigerian scammer posed as Steve Witkoff, co-chair of the Trump-Vance Inaugural Committee, to steal $250,300 in Ethereum-based USDT. #CryptoScam #CryptoScheme #FBI https://t.co/vqGv6Awtq3 ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 3, 2025 Legal experts flagged the full sealing as highly unusual. While redacting victim names is standard in DOJ filings, complete case sealing is typically reserved for matters involving national security or ongoing covert investigations. The fact that the DOJ had already publicized the complaint suggests the seal was never intended or authorized. DOJ Error Raises Questions on Transparency, Privacy, and MoonPay‚Äôs Role The original complaint, briefly visible before the sealing, identified the victims by first names: ‚ÄúIvan‚Äù and ‚ÄúMouna.‚Äù The crypto community immediately recognized the importance: those are the same first names as MoonPay‚Äôs CEO Ivan Soto-Wright and CFO Mouna Doumani. As NOTUS first reported , blockchain wallet addresses tied to the scam were previously linked to Soto-Wright in a 2023 lawsuit, further deepening the intrigue. While the DOJ has maintained that the executives were victims of identity fraud, the sealing chaos and MoonPay‚Äôs growing political affiliations have prompted fresh scrutiny. The company has recently positioned itself as an exclusive partner in the rollout of Trump-themed meme coins. Acting U.S. Attorney Jeanine Pirro confirmed to NOTUS that the full case seal was never requested by prosecutors. Instead, she said, a clerical mistake by court staff triggered the temporary blackout. ‚ÄúThe court made a ministerial, clerical error that, as soon as we realized it, within hours, the whole docket was unsealed,‚Äù Pirro stated. ‚ÄúThey admitted we never asked for the docket to be sealed.‚Äù According to Pirro, the DOJ only requested that the original complaint be sealed to redact a company‚Äôs name. An amended, public version was then submitted, though observers noted no clear difference in corporate naming between versions. ‚ÄúThis is the type of case where victims‚Äîincluding individuals, employees of a company, as well as a victim company‚Äîhave a right to not have their names included in a complaint,‚Äù Pirro added. As of now, MoonPay has not issued a public statement on the filing. Meanwhile, critics are pointing to the DOJ‚Äôs handling of the complaint as a troubling example of selective transparency, especially in a case involving influential crypto executives and political operatives. MoonPay Donates $1M to Pro-Crypto PAC During the 2024 Election In May 2024, MoonPay donated $1 million to Stand With Crypto , a political group backing pro-crypto legislation. The company cited growing regulatory pressure as its reason for supporting the PAC, which was launched to fund crypto-aligned candidates . MoonPay said the 2024 election will shape the industry‚Äôs future and called for support of lawmakers pushing for clear crypto rules. The move follows a broader trend of crypto firms donating to candidates, including Trump‚Äôs 2024 campaign. Federal Election Commission filings from April showed that several crypto firms and executives made large donations to President Donald Trump‚Äôs 2024 inauguration fund. These included $1 million from Solana Labs, over $245,000 from Uniswap founder Hayden Adams, and $100,000 from Consensys. Coinbase, Kraken, Ripple Labs, Robinhood, and Ondo Finance were also listed among donors. Following Trump‚Äôs re-election, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), now led by acting chair Mark Uyeda, has closed a number of enforcement cases involving donors, including those against Uniswap and Consensys. The post MoonPay Execs Caught in Trump-Linked $250K Crypto Scam ‚Äì Why Did DOJ Seal the Case? appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Tom Lee‚Äôs Ethereum Machine BitMine Floats Stock Options On NYSE
body: BitMine Immersion Technologies, an Ethereum-focused mining company , has taken a significant step in its growth as a cryptocurrency company. On July 23, the company announced that it began trading stock options on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) under the ticker symbol BMNR. Investors can now buy and sell options on BitMine shares. This gives them more ways to invest in the company. The new options listing indicates that more people are interested in BitMine and its plans for the expanding Ethereum market. Stock Options Give Investors More Choice The listing of BitMine stock options allows investors to trade the company‚Äôs shares more flexibly. Options give people the right to buy or sell a stock at a certain price by a specific date. This helps investors manage risk, plan future moves, and capitalize on price changes. The options for BitMine are listed on the NYSE and follow the rules of the Options Clearing Corporation (OCC), which helps maintain fair and safe trading. These options are available with various expiration dates and strike prices, allowing both small and large investors to select the option that best suits their needs. Ethereum‚Äôs Supply is Tight, and Demand is Growing The listing comes at a time when the Ethereum market is seeing a strong rally in the crypto market. Since mid-May 2025, investors have purchased over 2.83 million ETH, valued at approximately $10 billion. This is more than 30 times the amount of new ETH created in the same time. Most of this buying has come from exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and corporate treasuries. BitMine is one of those companies. These large purchases have pushed the price of Ethereum up by over 160% since April. Experts say the rise is not just about hype; it is mainly due to real demand. At the same time, only around 800,000 new ETH are expected to be released over the next year. This creates a big gap between supply and demand, which is expected to keep pushing the coin‚Äôs prices higher. BitMine‚Äôs Long-Term Plan for Ethereum Leadership BitMine is not just mining cryptocurrency. It has a clear and long-term strategy. The company aims to establish one of the most extensive Ethereum holdings in the world by acquiring 5% of the total ETH supply. This goal gives the company a strong position and continues to attract institutional investors, such as Cathie Wood‚Äôs Ark Invest, as the market evolves. Other companies, such as Bit Digital and SharpLink Gaming, are also adding ETH to their balance sheets . Together, they are helping to change how Ethereum is seen, not just as a currency, but as a valuable asset for long-term growth. The post Tom Lee‚Äôs Ethereum Machine BitMine Floats Stock Options On NYSE appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Teucrium CEO Slams Gary Gensler‚Äôs ETF U-Turn, Reveals Why He‚Äôs Backing XRP
body: The post Teucrium CEO Slams Gary Gensler‚Äôs ETF U-Turn, Reveals Why He‚Äôs Backing XRP appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News In a recent interview, Sal Gilbertie, CEO of Teucrium Trading, opened up about his firm‚Äôs experience in the crypto ETF space and why he‚Äôs backing XRP. He said that the SEC was initially hesitant. They asked Teucrium and others to withdraw their filings, citing low liquidity in the futures market. Sal recalled that the government‚Äôs stance at the time forced firms like his to comply. Yet, he and his team continued to track the market closely. When they believed liquidity had improved, they refiled. SEC Changes the Rules Midway Teucrium filed its Bitcoin futures ETF under the 1933 Act, which came with a long 270-day approval timeline. Later that same year, former SEC ChairmanGary Gensler changed the rules and allowed filings under the 1940 Act, a quicker, 75-day process commonly used for mutual funds. Many large firms like BlackRock and Fidelity jumped in under this structure and got approvals faster, even though Teucrium had filed first. Talking to Thinking Crypto, Sal described this sudden shift as ‚Äúvery disconcerting,‚Äù explaining how it cost his firm valuable market opportunities. Despite this, Teucrium‚Äôs approved filing played a key role in Grayscale‚Äôs legal battle against the SEC. Sal said that Teucrium‚Äôs approval was referenced in the lawsuit, which Grayscale ultimately won.. Why Teucrium Is Betting on XRP Sal also shared why his firm has now filed for a leveraged XRP ETF, called ‚ÄúDouble XRP.‚Äù While he doesn‚Äôt consider himself a fan of coins like Ethereum or Solana, he understands and supports the mission behind XRP. According to him, Ripple‚Äôs focus on modernizing cross-border payments and replacing the outdated SWIFT system is both practical and powerful. He believes Ripple has consistently demonstrated professionalism and long-term strategy, particularly in improving the speed and efficiency of asset transfers. He said, ‚ÄúAnything that speeds up the system makes sense.‚Äù Rather than compete head-to-head with big firms like BlackRock and Fidelity for a basic spot XRP ETF, Teucrium filed for a more specialized leveraged XRP ETF. This plays to their strength in derivatives and allows them to stand out in a crowded field.

title: Nintendo Switch sets new record as fastest-selling gaming hardware in US history
body: The Nintendo Switch has set a new record as the fastest-selling video game hardware device in US history. According to data, Nintendo Switch 2 sold 1.6 million units in June 2025. This surpasses the previous record set by the PlayStation 4 in November 2013 with 1.1 million consoles. Nintendo Switch 2 sales began on June 5, 2025. The best-selling device in terms of dollar sales was the Pro Controller for the Nintendo Switch 2. Circana data from Executive Director Mat Piscatella on Bluesky estimates that over 1 million Switch 2 consoles were sold in North America. According to a list of the best-selling games each month, four of the games featured in the top 20 have native Switch 2 ports, with several others having backward-compatible Switch 1 releases. Mario Kart World came in third on the list, which is quite an achievement given that neither digital sales nor console bundle sales were counted. Meanwhile, Nintendo Switch 2 is not constantly in stock, but there are positive signs that supply is catching up with demand. Switch 2 restocks are becoming more frequent and lasting longer before the console returns to its default state of being sold out. The gaming industry saw a surge amid tariffs The Switch 2 has way more storage , higher quality video output, maximum frame rates, and a bigger screen than both the original Switch and 2021‚Äôs Switch OLED. The original Switch cost $300, the OLED $350. Now the price of Switch 2 is $449.99. When asked if Nintendo priced the console correctly, Piscatella said, ‚ÄúDay 1 buyers are going to be the least price sensitive. They still would have bought if the Switch 2 launched at an even higher price,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThe real test will be during the holiday, when more mass market/gift buyers will be considering a purchase.‚Äù In addition, due to Trump‚Äôs tariffs, the cost of all accessories for the Nintendo Switch 2 went up. This shows the effort to evaluate the potential impact of Trump‚Äôs tariffs. However, this was also across the board. After the tariffs, the Xbox Series S with 512GB of storage costs $379.99 in the US, up from $299.99. The Xbox Series X goes for $599.99 instead of $499.99. Meanwhile, the special edition of the Xbox Wireless Controller increased $10 to $79.99. However, even after the rocky tariff period, the total spending in the US on gaming hardware in June 2025 showed year-over-year growth of 249%, reaching $978 million according to Circana. This set a new record for hardware spending in June in the US, surpassing the $608 million recorded in June 2008. Also, across the board, $4.4 billion was spent on video games in June, with the Switch 2 helping bolster this figure with its launch lineup. Nintendo Announces Pok√©mon Legends Switch 2 Bundle Nintendo has officially revealed a brand-new Switch 2 bundle with its upcoming hit game, Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A. After the limited-time Mario Kart World bundle, this is the second big bundle for the new system. Ad: Nintendo Switch 2 Console + Pok√©mon: Legends Z-A Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Bundle (Digital Download in Console) pre-order on Target => https://t.co/ZyVTao8UAa pic.twitter.com/VUa0rw4oNN ‚Äî SOLELINKS (@SOLELINKS) July 22, 2025 This bundle has no unique artwork or special edition hardware like other Pok√©mon-themed consoles, like the Pok√©mon Sword and Shield Switch Lite. It‚Äôs a simple package for fans who can‚Äôt wait to start the next journey. Preorders for the combo are now open at major retailers for $499.99, matching the price of the Mario Kart World combo. Those in possession of a Switch 2 can, however, preorder Pok√©mon Legends: Z-A independently from Amazon or Target for $69.99. title: Tether Expands Partnership with INHOPE to Combat Online Child Exploitation
body: Tether has announced a partnership with INHOPE, the global network focused on fighting Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM) online, to stop the illicit use of digital transactions in child exploitation networks. Key Takeaways: Tether has expanded its partnership with INHOPE to combat the use of crypto in child exploitation. The company has frozen $225 million in USDT linked to human trafficking and romance scams. Tether says it has blocked $2.7 billion to date. In a Wednesday press release , Tether, issuer of the world‚Äôs most widely used stablecoin, said it has implemented monitoring tools and compliance protocols to identify and disrupt suspicious financial activity linked to CSAM. The move deepens a relationship that began in 2023, when Tether became INHOPE‚Äôs first cryptocurrency partner. Tether Teams Up With Regulators to Tackle Crypto Crime Tether said it works with exchanges, law enforcement, and international regulators to trace and prevent such abuse. ‚ÄúBlockchain technology has the power to bring transparency and accountability to financial transactions,‚Äù said Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino. ‚ÄúBy expanding this initiative, we reinforce our commitment to responsible innovation and safeguarding the integrity of digital assets.‚Äù The collaboration comes amid Tether‚Äôs growing role in efforts to dismantle criminal networks. INHOPE is excited to expand our partnership with @Tether_to in the fight against CSAM. As our first crypto partner in 2023, their ongoing commitment shows how vital financial companies are in this fight. Proud to welcome them as a Gold Partner https://t.co/QGPAzjl65P ‚Äî INHOPE (@INHOPE_PR) July 23, 2025 As reported, Tether has frozen $225 million worth of USDT linked to a large-scale ‚Äúpig butchering‚Äù romance scam and international human trafficking operation, marking the largest USDT confiscation to date. The action followed a months-long investigation in collaboration with crypto exchange OKX and the U.S. Department of Justice. The seized funds were traced using blockchain analytics tools provided by Chainalysis, allowing investigators to follow the movement of illicit tokens and prevent further misuse. The wallets involved were self-custodial, requiring extended tracking efforts across multiple jurisdictions. In May, a Tether representative told Cryptonews.com that the company has successfully frozen and blocked $2.7 billion in USD‚ÇÆ to date. The statement came in response to a report that claimed a delay in Tether‚Äôs wallet blacklisting process allowed over $78 million in illicit funds to be moved before enforcement actions could be executed. ‚ÄúWhile any delay in enforcement should be examined, the idea that this represents a systemic loophole is both misleading and lacking perspective as Tether collaborates with law enforcement to freeze addresses on a daily basis,‚Äù the representative said. Stablecoins Surge to $252B, but Security Lags Behind The first half of 2025 saw the stablecoin market grow substantially, with total supply rising from $204 billion to $252 billion and monthly settlement volumes hitting $1.39 trillion, according to CertiK‚Äôs latest report. Despite this momentum, the firm warned that many projects remain vulnerable due to uneven security measures and inconsistent regulatory readiness. CertiK‚Äôs Skynet Stablecoin Framework assessed top stablecoins based on compliance, transparency, and operational risks. USDT maintained dominance, especially on Tron, while USDC strengthened its position with a MiCA license and IPO. Other strong performers included PYUSD, RLUSD, and FDUSD. However, the sector recorded $2.47 billion in losses across 344 incidents, largely due to poor key management and flawed DeFi logic, not smart contract bugs. One of the most alarming events was FDUSD‚Äôs temporary depeg to $0.76 in March, triggered by concerns over reserve quality. The post Tether Expands Partnership with INHOPE to Combat Online Child Exploitation appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Revolutionary Walrus Protocol Quilt: Powering Sui‚Äôs On-Chain Storage Future
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Walrus Protocol Quilt: Powering Sui‚Äôs On-Chain Storage Future In the rapidly evolving landscape of blockchain technology, innovation is the cornerstone of progress. Today, we delve into a significant development that promises to reshape how data is managed on-chain: the launch of Walrus Protocol Quilt on the Sui Blockchain. This isn‚Äôt just another update; it‚Äôs a pivotal moment for developers and users alike, offering a dedicated solution for storing small, yet critical, digital assets directly on a decentralized ledger. If you‚Äôve ever wondered about the practicalities of housing NFTs, AI data, or even system logs securely and scalably on a blockchain, then this breakthrough is set to capture your attention. What is Walrus Protocol Quilt and Why Does it Matter? The announcement from the Layer-1 blockchain Sui on X (formerly Twitter) highlighted the arrival of Walrus Protocol Quilt , a native storage solution specifically engineered for compact data. But what exactly does this mean, and why is it such a significant step forward for the blockchain ecosystem? At its core, Quilt is designed to address a long-standing challenge in decentralized applications: the efficient and cost-effective storage of small files directly on the blockchain. Native Integration: Unlike off-chain storage solutions that require bridges or external services, Quilt is built directly on Sui, ensuring seamless integration and enhanced security. Optimized for Small Files: While traditional blockchain storage can be expensive and inefficient for small data packets, Quilt is purpose-built to handle items like NFTs, AI model parameters, game assets, and application logs with greater efficiency. Scalability at its Core: Designed to support highly scalable, on-chain applications, Quilt provides the foundational layer for complex dApps that demand reliable and persistent data storage. The importance of Walrus Protocol Quilt cannot be overstated. It unlocks new possibilities for developers who previously faced limitations in storing certain types of data directly on-chain, often resorting to less decentralized or more complex hybrid solutions. This native capability streamlines development, reduces complexity, and enhances the overall integrity of on-chain applications. How Does Walrus Protocol Quilt Enhance Sui‚Äôs Ecosystem? Sui, known for its high throughput and low-latency capabilities, provides a robust foundation for innovative decentralized applications. The integration of Walrus Protocol Quilt further solidifies Sui‚Äôs position as a leading Layer-1 blockchain by filling a crucial gap in its infrastructure. This synergy creates a more complete and powerful ecosystem for developers and users. Consider the following aspects of how Quilt enhances Sui: Feature Impact on Sui Ecosystem Traditional Approach (Challenges) Native On-Chain Storage Enables direct, secure storage of small files, reducing reliance on centralized services and improving data integrity. Off-chain storage (e.g., AWS, IPFS) requires external links, potential for data availability issues, and less decentralization. Optimized for Small Data Cost-effective and efficient storage for NFTs, AI data, and logs, making complex dApps more viable on Sui. Storing small files directly on many blockchains can be prohibitively expensive due to high gas fees and block size limitations. Scalability Support Provides a scalable storage layer that complements Sui‚Äôs high transaction throughput, fostering the growth of data-intensive applications. Scalability bottlenecks arise when dApps need to store significant amounts of small, frequently accessed data on a blockchain not optimized for it. Enhanced Developer Experience Simplifies development for applications requiring persistent on-chain data, leading to faster innovation and deployment. Developers often have to build complex workarounds or integrate multiple services to achieve desired data storage capabilities. This deep integration means that applications built on Sui can now leverage a purpose-built storage layer that aligns perfectly with the blockchain‚Äôs performance characteristics. It‚Äôs a game-changer for applications that generate or utilize significant amounts of small, granular data. Unlocking New Possibilities with Walrus Protocol Quilt: Use Cases and Beyond The introduction of Walrus Protocol Quilt opens up a Pandora‚Äôs box of possibilities across various sectors. Its ability to efficiently store small files on-chain means that applications that were previously impractical or too costly to implement can now become a reality on Sui. Let‚Äôs explore some compelling use cases: NFT Metadata and Evolution: Beyond just image files, NFTs often have dynamic metadata that changes over time (e.g., gaming NFTs that level up). Quilt can store this evolving metadata directly on-chain, ensuring its immutability and transparency. AI Model Data and Logs: For decentralized AI applications, small training data sets, model parameters, or even inference logs can be stored on-chain for auditing, verification, and transparency. This is crucial for building trust in AI systems. Gaming Assets and State: Imagine storing small, frequently updated game assets, character attributes, or game state logs directly on-chain. This enhances security, prevents cheating, and creates truly decentralized gaming experiences. Supply Chain and IoT Data: Small data points from IoT sensors (temperature, location, status updates) or supply chain events (batch numbers, timestamps) can be efficiently recorded on Quilt, providing an immutable audit trail. Decentralized Social Media Logs: User interactions, small content snippets, or moderation logs could be stored on-chain, enabling greater transparency and censorship resistance for decentralized social platforms. The versatility of Walrus Protocol Quilt extends beyond these examples. Any application that benefits from secure, transparent, and scalable on-chain storage for small, frequently accessed data will find immense value in this new solution. Are There Any Challenges or Considerations for Walrus Protocol Quilt? While the launch of Walrus Protocol Quilt is undoubtedly a positive development, like any new technology, it comes with its own set of considerations and potential challenges. Understanding these aspects is crucial for a balanced perspective and successful adoption. Key considerations include: Adoption Rate: The success of Quilt will depend on its adoption by developers and projects building on Sui. Educational resources and strong community support will be vital. Cost-Effectiveness: While optimized for small files, the long-term cost of storing large volumes of data, even if small per item, needs to be continuously evaluated and managed by dApp developers. Security Audits: As a fundamental infrastructure layer, continuous and rigorous security audits are paramount to ensure the integrity and safety of stored data. Decentralization Guarantees: Ensuring that the underlying infrastructure supporting Quilt remains truly decentralized is critical to uphold the core tenets of blockchain technology. Interoperability: While native to Sui, exploring future interoperability with other chains or data layers could expand its utility, though this might introduce new complexities. Addressing these considerations proactively will be key to the long-term success and widespread utility of Walrus Protocol Quilt . The Walrus Protocol team, in collaboration with the Sui community, will need to continuously iterate and optimize the solution. The Future is Bright: What‚Äôs Next for Walrus Protocol Quilt and Sui? The launch of Walrus Protocol Quilt marks a significant milestone for both Walrus Protocol and the Sui Blockchain. It signals a maturation of the ecosystem, providing a specialized solution for a critical component of decentralized applications: data storage. As the Web3 space continues to evolve, the demand for efficient, secure, and scalable on-chain storage solutions will only grow. We can anticipate several exciting developments in the near future: Increased dApp Innovation: Developers will likely leverage Quilt to build more sophisticated and data-rich applications on Sui, pushing the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible on-chain. Ecosystem Growth: The enhanced capabilities offered by Quilt could attract more projects and users to the Sui ecosystem, fostering a virtuous cycle of growth and innovation. Further Optimizations: As usage grows, expect continuous improvements in efficiency, cost, and features for Walrus Protocol Quilt , driven by community feedback and technological advancements. New Use Cases Emerge: The creativity of the developer community will undoubtedly uncover novel applications for Quilt that we haven‚Äôt even envisioned yet. The journey for Walrus Protocol Quilt has just begun, but its potential impact on the future of on-chain data management on Sui is undeniable. It‚Äôs a testament to the ongoing innovation within the blockchain space, constantly striving to build more robust, scalable, and user-friendly decentralized systems. Summary: A New Era for On-Chain Data on Sui The launch of Walrus Protocol Quilt on the Sui Blockchain is a monumental step forward for on-chain data storage. By providing a native, scalable, and efficient solution for small files like NFTs, AI data, and logs, Quilt addresses a critical need in the decentralized application landscape. This innovation not only enhances Sui‚Äôs capabilities but also empowers developers to build more complex, data-rich, and truly decentralized applications. As the Web3 ecosystem continues its rapid expansion, solutions like Quilt will be instrumental in unlocking its full potential, ensuring that data integrity, scalability, and efficiency remain at the forefront of blockchain development. It‚Äôs an exciting time for the Sui community and anyone invested in the future of decentralized technology. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Walrus Protocol Quilt? Walrus Protocol Quilt is a native storage solution launched on the Sui Blockchain, specifically designed for efficient and scalable on-chain storage of small files such as NFT metadata, AI data, and application logs. Why is on-chain storage for small files important? On-chain storage for small files ensures data immutability, transparency, and decentralization. It‚Äôs crucial for applications where data integrity and direct blockchain verification are paramount, such as dynamic NFTs, verifiable AI models, and secure logging. How does Walrus Protocol Quilt benefit developers on Sui? Quilt simplifies the development of data-intensive decentralized applications by providing a purpose-built, cost-effective, and scalable solution for storing small data directly on Sui, eliminating the need for complex off-chain workarounds. Can Quilt be used for large files like videos or high-resolution images? No, Walrus Protocol Quilt is specifically optimized for small files. For large media files, traditional decentralized storage solutions like IPFS or Arweave, often referenced by on-chain pointers, are typically more suitable. What kind of data can be stored using Walrus Protocol Quilt? Quilt is ideal for data such as NFT metadata, AI model parameters and inference logs, small game assets, IoT sensor data, supply chain event logs, and small content snippets for decentralized social media platforms. Share This Insight! Found this article on Walrus Protocol Quilt insightful? Share it with your network on social media! Help us spread the word about this groundbreaking development on the Sui Blockchain and its potential to revolutionize on-chain data storage. Your share helps others discover the future of decentralized applications! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the blockchain industry‚Äôs future-oriented activities. This post Revolutionary Walrus Protocol Quilt: Powering Sui‚Äôs On-Chain Storage Future first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: SWIFT Fades, XRP Rises: Analyst Predicts Major Paradigm Shift
body: Is a Systemic Shift Brewing? In the world of global finance, a seismic shift may be underway. According to crypto pundit Pumpius, the traditional SWIFT banking system is nearing its twilight, and XRP is positioning itself as the strategic successor. As the backbone of international money transfers, SWIFT is used by over 11,000 financial institutions and has long dominated the cross-border payments space. However, it has been criticized for being slow, costly, and outdated in an era that increasingly values speed and transparency. This is where XRP enters the picture. Pumpius argues that XRP is emerging as the ‚Äùnew chesspiece‚Äù in global finance due to its ability to settle transactions in seconds, at fractions of a cent, and without the need for intermediaries. Unlike SWIFT, which simply sends payment instructions, XRP enables actual value transfer, offering finality and liquidity in real-time. At the heart of Pumpius‚Äô thesis is RippleNet‚Äôs growing adoption. For instance, more than 100 financial institutions worldwide have partnered with Ripple, using its blockchain-powered On-Demand Liquidity (ODL) system, which leverages XRP to bridge fiat currencies across borders. Countries exploring central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) are also considering the XRPL technology to enable cross-border interoperability. Geopolitical developments is another factor that might fuel the XRP Ledger adoption. With rising tensions between East and West and the weaponization of SWIFT, such as its exclusion of certain nations from the network, there‚Äôs growing demand for a politically neutral, decentralized alternative. XRP, with its global reach and increasing regulatory clarity, fits that profile. SWIFT‚Äôs last sunset isn‚Äôt just about technology, it‚Äôs about control,‚Äù says Pumpius. ‚ÄúAs power shifts away from legacy institutions to decentralized networks, XRP stands as the most viable bridge between old money and the new digital economy.‚Äù XRP Ledger Wallets Soar to a Record High of 7.24 Million According to CryptoQuant data, the XRP Ledger has hit an exceptional milestone of more than 7.24 million active wallets, marking the strongest surge in its history. Therefore, this breakthrough reflects a dynamic fusion of retail enthusiasm, institutional backing, and robust network upgrades. Given that cross-border adoption, real-world asset tokenization, and prominent endorsements are converging to transform XRPL‚Äôs ecosystem, crypto-on-chain analytics are bullish. As a result, experts now view XRPL as a viable alternative to SWIFT, projecting as much as 14% of global payments volume could shift onto the ledger in coming years. Conclusion Renowned analyst Pumpius predicts a turning point in global finance because as the legacy SWIFT system fades, XRP is rising as the new strategic linchpin for cross-border value transfer, thanks to the XRP Ledger. As a result, with wallet growth at 7.24 million, active usage at unprecedented levels, whale accumulation breaking records, and powerful institutional validation unfolding, the XRPL stands at the threshold of accelerated mainstream adoption.

title: Massive Crypto Futures Liquidation: Over $600 Million Vanishes in 24 Hours
body: BitcoinWorld Massive Crypto Futures Liquidation: Over $600 Million Vanishes in 24 Hours Imagine losing a fortune in mere moments. In the fast-paced world of digital assets, such dramatic shifts are not uncommon. Recently, the cryptocurrency market witnessed a significant event: a massive crypto futures liquidation wave. Within a single hour, major exchanges processed liquidations totaling an astonishing $110 million. Zooming out, the past 24 hours saw an even more staggering figure, with over $607 million worth of futures positions wiped out. These numbers aren‚Äôt just statistics; they represent substantial capital shifts and a stark reminder of the inherent volatility in leveraged trading. But what exactly is a crypto futures liquidation , and what does such a rapid and large-scale event signify for traders and the broader market? Understanding the Mechanism of Crypto Futures Liquidation To truly grasp the gravity of recent events, it‚Äôs essential to understand the mechanics behind crypto futures liquidation . Futures contracts in cryptocurrency trading allow investors to speculate on the future price of an asset without owning the underlying asset itself. A key characteristic of futures trading is the use of leverage. Leverage: This allows traders to control a large position with a relatively small amount of capital, known as margin. For example, 10x leverage means you can control $10,000 worth of Bitcoin with just $1,000 of your own money. While leverage can amplify profits, it also dramatically amplifies losses. Margin: The collateral you put up to open and maintain a leveraged position. It acts as a safety net for the exchange, ensuring you can cover potential losses. Liquidation Price: Every leveraged position has a specific price point at which, if the market moves against your trade sufficiently, your margin falls below the maintenance margin requirement. At this point, the exchange automatically closes your position to prevent further losses to your account and to protect itself from potential bad debt. This forced closure is what we call a crypto futures liquidation . When prices move sharply and unexpectedly, many leveraged positions can hit their liquidation prices simultaneously, leading to a cascade of forced selling. This often exacerbates price movements, creating a ‚Äòliquidation cascade‚Äô or ‚Äòlong squeeze‚Äô (if prices fall rapidly) or ‚Äòshort squeeze‚Äô (if prices rise rapidly). The Immediate Impact: What Caused the $110 Million Crypto Futures Liquidation? The recent $110 million crypto futures liquidation in just one hour highlights the extreme sensitivity of the market to sudden price swings. While the exact trigger for such an immediate and brutal flush can be multifaceted, it typically stems from a confluence of factors: Sudden Price Movement: A sharp, unexpected price drop (or rise) in a major cryptocurrency like Bitcoin or Ethereum can quickly push numerous leveraged positions to their liquidation thresholds. This initial move might be triggered by a large sell order from a whale, negative news, or even a technical breakdown of a key support level. High Leverage: The prevalence of high leverage options (e.g., 50x, 100x) on many exchanges means that even small price movements can lead to significant losses for traders, making them highly vulnerable to liquidation. Market Depth and Liquidity: In moments of extreme volatility, market depth can thin out, meaning there aren‚Äôt enough buy or sell orders to absorb large trades without significant price impact. This can accelerate the liquidation process, as orders are filled at rapidly declining prices. The speed at which $110 million was wiped out underscores the ‚Äòflash crash‚Äô potential in highly leveraged markets, where algorithms and automated trading systems react instantly to market shifts, often triggering further liquidations and exacerbating the price movement. Beyond the Hour: The Broader Implications of $607 Million in Crypto Futures Liquidation While the hourly figure was striking, the broader context of $607 million in crypto futures liquidation over 24 hours paints a clearer picture of sustained market pressure. This larger figure indicates that the initial shockwave extended, affecting a wider range of traders and positions across various cryptocurrencies. Trader Sentiment: Such large-scale liquidations can significantly dampen market sentiment. Traders who have been liquidated often become more cautious, leading to reduced trading activity or a shift towards less risky strategies. This can create a period of fear and uncertainty in the market. Price Volatility: The forced selling from liquidations can create a downward spiral, pushing prices even lower as more positions are liquidated, creating a feedback loop. Conversely, a ‚Äòshort squeeze‚Äô can drive prices higher, leading to liquidations of short positions. Market Health Indicator: While painful for individual traders, large liquidation events can sometimes be seen as a ‚Äòcleansing‚Äô of excessive leverage from the market. After a significant deleveraging, the market might be in a healthier position for more sustainable growth, as speculative froth is removed. Exchange Stability: Major exchanges are generally equipped to handle these events due to robust risk management systems. However, extreme volatility tests their infrastructure, ensuring proper risk management protocols are in place to prevent systemic issues. Understanding these broader implications is crucial for anyone participating in or observing the crypto market, as liquidation events are powerful indicators of market stress and the overall level of leverage in the system. Why Do Massive Crypto Futures Liquidations Keep Happening? The recurring nature of massive crypto futures liquidation events isn‚Äôt a coincidence; it‚Äôs a byproduct of the market‚Äôs structure and participant behavior. Several factors contribute to their frequency and scale: High Volatility: Cryptocurrencies are inherently more volatile than traditional assets. This high volatility, combined with the widespread use of leverage, creates fertile ground for rapid liquidations. Even small news events or shifts in sentiment can trigger significant price swings. 24/7 Trading: Unlike traditional markets, crypto markets never close. This constant activity means price movements can occur at any time, catching traders off guard, especially those not actively monitoring their positions or those relying on sleep. Retail Dominance and Emotional Trading: A significant portion of crypto traders are retail investors who may be less experienced with risk management. Emotional trading driven by Fear Of Missing Out (FOMO) during rallies or Fear, Uncertainty, and Doubt (FUD) during downturns can lead to overleveraging and poor decision-making. Cross-Market Correlation: Crypto markets can sometimes react to macro-economic news or movements in traditional financial markets (e.g., stock market downturns, interest rate changes), creating unexpected shocks that ripple through the crypto space. Whale Activity and Market Dynamics: Large holders (whales) can sometimes execute significant buy or sell orders that deliberately trigger liquidations. By pushing the price past key support or resistance levels, they can force the closure of numerous leveraged positions, often benefiting from the subsequent price movement. While not always manipulative, large institutional moves can have disproportionate impacts. Cascading Effects: Once an initial wave of liquidations begins, the forced selling (or buying) from these liquidations can further accelerate the price movement, pushing more positions into their liquidation zone. This creates a powerful feedback loop, leading to a ‚Äòliquidation cascade‚Äô that can dramatically amplify the initial price shock. This domino effect is why liquidations often appear to happen so rapidly and in such large volumes. These factors combine to create a dynamic environment where significant price swings are not just possible, but often probable, making effective risk management paramount for anyone involved in futures trading. Navigating the Storm: Strategies to Mitigate Crypto Futures Liquidation Risks For traders looking to participate in the futures market, understanding and mitigating the risks associated with crypto futures liquidation is paramount. Here are some actionable strategies to protect your capital: Manage Your Leverage Wisely: This is arguably the most critical advice. While high leverage can offer tempting returns, it dramatically increases your liquidation risk. Consider using lower leverage, especially if you are new to futures trading or during periods of high market uncertainty. A lower leverage ratio provides a wider buffer before liquidation. Implement Strict Stop-Loss Orders: A stop-loss order automatically closes your position when the price reaches a predetermined level, limiting your potential losses and preventing liquidation. This is your primary defense mechanism against unexpected market moves. Always place a stop-loss when opening a leveraged position. Understand Margin Requirements: Always be aware of your initial margin (the capital required to open a position) and maintenance margin (the minimum equity needed to keep a position open). Ensure you have sufficient funds in your account to cover potential drawdowns. Consider adding more collateral (margin top-up) if your position is nearing liquidation, known as ‚Äòmargin call‚Äô. Diversify Your Portfolio: Don‚Äôt put all your capital into a single leveraged trade or a single asset. Diversifying across different assets or trading strategies can help spread risk and prevent a single liquidation event from wiping out your entire portfolio. Stay Informed and Monitor the Market: Keep abreast of market news, technical analysis, and sentiment. Unexpected announcements, regulatory changes, or major economic data releases can trigger rapid price movements. Constant vigilance is key in the 24/7 crypto market. Practice Sound Risk Management: Define your risk tolerance before entering any trade. Only risk a small percentage of your total capital on any single trade (e.g., 1-2%). This helps ensure that even if a trade goes wrong, it doesn‚Äôt severely impact your overall trading capital. Consider Isolated vs. Cross Margin: Understand the difference between these margin modes. Isolated margin limits the risk to a specific position, meaning only the margin allocated to that position is at risk of liquidation. Cross margin uses your entire account balance as collateral, which can lead to larger losses if not managed carefully, but also provides more flexibility. Choose the mode that aligns with your risk strategy. Psychological Preparedness: Trading, especially leveraged trading, is as much about psychology as it is about strategy. Emotions like greed and fear can lead to impulsive decisions. Developing emotional discipline, sticking to your trading plan, and avoiding revenge trading after a loss are vital. Recognize that losses are part of trading, and focus on long-term consistency rather than short-term wins. Continuous Learning and Adaptation: The crypto market is constantly evolving. New protocols, regulatory changes, and technological advancements can all impact market dynamics. Successful traders continuously learn, adapt their strategies, and stay updated on market trends and risk management techniques. Analyzing past liquidation events, understanding their triggers, and learning from your own trading mistakes can provide invaluable insights for future trades. By adopting these disciplined approaches, traders can significantly reduce their exposure to the devastating effects of a sudden crypto futures liquidation and navigate the volatile crypto landscape with greater confidence. The recent event, where $110 million in crypto futures liquidation occurred in an hour, and over $607 million vanished in 24 hours, serves as a powerful reminder of the high stakes involved in leveraged cryptocurrency trading. While futures offer incredible opportunities for profit, they come with amplified risks, primarily the threat of liquidation. For both seasoned traders and newcomers, the key takeaway is clear: knowledge, discipline, and robust risk management are not just recommendations but absolute necessities. The crypto market will continue to be volatile, but by understanding its mechanisms and preparing for its inherent risks, traders can navigate its complexities with greater confidence and resilience. Stay informed, stay cautious, and trade responsibly. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) 1. What exactly is a crypto futures liquidation? A crypto futures liquidation is the forced closure of a trader‚Äôs leveraged position by an exchange when their margin (collateral) falls below a certain level due to adverse price movements. This happens automatically to prevent the trader from incurring further losses and to protect the exchange. 2. Why do crypto liquidations happen so quickly? Liquidations occur rapidly due to the high volatility of cryptocurrencies, the widespread use of high leverage, and the automated nature of trading systems. A small, sudden price swing can trigger a cascade of liquidations as stop-loss levels are hit and margin calls are activated, leading to a domino effect. 3. How can traders avoid crypto futures liquidation? Traders can minimize liquidation risk by using lower leverage, setting strict stop-loss orders, understanding and maintaining sufficient margin, diversifying their portfolio, and staying informed about market conditions. Emotional discipline and a robust risk management plan are also crucial. 4. What is the difference between isolated and cross margin? Isolated margin limits the risk of liquidation to a specific position, meaning only the margin allocated to that trade is at risk. Cross margin, on the other hand, uses your entire available account balance as collateral for all open positions, which can lead to larger losses but offers more flexibility in managing margin across trades. 5. Do large liquidations impact the overall crypto market? Yes, large-scale liquidations can significantly impact the overall crypto market. They often lead to increased price volatility, can dampen trader sentiment, and contribute to broader market downturns or sharp rebounds as excessive leverage is flushed out. While painful, they can sometimes ‚Äòcleanse‚Äô the market, potentially leading to healthier, more sustainable growth. If you found this article insightful and believe it can help others understand the dynamics of crypto futures liquidation, please consider sharing it on your social media platforms. Your shares help us spread crucial knowledge and foster a more informed trading community. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin and Ethereum price action. This post Massive Crypto Futures Liquidation: Over $600 Million Vanishes in 24 Hours first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: SEC Approves Bitwise ETF, Then Immediately Reverses Decision Hours Later
body: The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) granted accelerated approval for Bitwise‚Äôs 10 Crypto Index ETF on July 22, only to reverse the decision hours later through a stay order. The approved ETF would have tracked ten digital assets, including Bitcoin , Ethereum , XRP , Solana , Cardano , SUI , Avalanche , Litecoin , Polkadot , and others, with at least 85% of its allocation dedicated to previously approved components, such as Bitcoin and Ethereum. BREAKING: SEC approves conversion of Bitwise 10 Crypto Index Fund into an ETF which includes $BTC , $ETH , $XRP , $SOL , $ADA , $SUI , $AVAX , $LTC , $DOT . pic.twitter.com/FgQrIVH3dY ‚Äî SolanaFloor (@SolanaFloor) July 22, 2025 A Pause or a No? NYSE Arca received permission to amend its rules for listing the multi-asset fund before the Commission intervened. Assistant Secretary Sherry Haywood issued a stay notice under Rule 431, stating that the Commission would review the delegated action taken by the Division of Trading and Markets. Just hours after the initial approval, SEC Assistant Secretary Sherry R. Haywood invoked Rule 431 to stay the order, sending the decision to the full Commission for further review and freezing the conversion process pic.twitter.com/aPjZlHEvdV ‚Äî Martyn Lucas Investor (@MartynInvestor) July 23, 2025 The reversal occurred despite the SEC finding the proposal consistent with Exchange Act requirements for preventing fraudulent practices and protecting investors. The dramatic policy flip comes as 72 crypto-related ETF applications await regulatory approval from providers including Grayscale, CoinShares, Franklin Templeton, and VanEck. Bloomberg Intelligence assigns 95% approval odds for Solana, XRP, and Litecoin ETFs this year, while existing Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs continue attracting billions in institutional inflows. Ethereum ETFs recorded $533.87 million in net inflows on July 22 , marking the third-largest single-day inflow since inception, while Bitcoin ETFs experienced $67.93 million in outflows. Regulatory Confusion Emerges as Multi-Asset Approval Process Stalls The Bitwise 10 Crypto Index ETF approval represented a major expansion beyond existing Bitcoin and Ethereum products, with holdings weighted by market capitalization and monthly rebalancing. As of June 30, Bitcoin comprised 78.72% and Ethereum 11.10% of the proposed fund, with the remaining eight cryptocurrencies making up the rest. The SEC‚Äôs accelerated approval process typically applies to non-controversial rule changes that align with existing regulations. The Commission found Bitwise‚Äôs 85% allocation requirement for previously approved components to be sufficient to mitigate fraud and manipulation risks, consistent with prior 80% thresholds for similar products. NYSE Arca‚Äôs rule amendments would have allowed Trust Units issued by limited liability companies and explicitly permitted index-based investments. The changes included conforming corporate governance policies and eliminating shareholder meeting requirements, aligning with existing treatment of investment vehicles. The Division of Trading and Markets took the initial approval action under delegated authority before senior Commission officials intervened with the stay order. The reversal suggests disagreement within the SEC about multi-asset crypto product approvals despite technical rule compliance. Coinbase Custody Trust Company would have served as a digital asset custodian, while Bank of New York Mellon provided cash custody and administration services. The ETF structure included cash-based creation and redemption in 10,000-share units, with daily net asset value calculations using CF Benchmarks pricing data. Institutional Demand Surges Despite Regulatory Uncertainty Existing crypto ETFs continue to experience massive institutional adoption despite regulatory confusion. Ethereum ETFs have attracted $8.32 billion in cumulative inflows since their inception, with BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA leading Tuesday‚Äôs surge with $426.22 million. The fund now manages over $10 billion in assets, representing 2.24% of Ethereum‚Äôs circulating supply. Bitcoin ETFs hold a total of $154.77 billion in assets , despite recent outflows, accounting for approximately 6.5% of Bitcoin‚Äôs market capitalization. Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC recorded $7.51 million in inflows, while Ark Invest‚Äôs ARKB and Bitwise‚Äôs BITB experienced outflows exceeding $30 million each. The pending ETF pipeline includes applications for Dogecoin, MELANIA, TRUMP, and other meme tokens alongside serious institutional products. Most recently, 21Shares filed for an ONDO token ETF that tracks the native token of Ondo Finance, a layer-1 blockchain designed for institutional finance and the tokenization of real-world assets. Grayscale‚Äôs Digital Large Cap Fund conversion to ETF status faced similar approval-then-uncertainty patterns, with speculation mounting about potential stays. BREAKING: SEC Acknowledges Amendment To Convert Grayscale's Digital Large Cap Fund Into ETF Including $BTC , $ETH , $XRP , $SOL & $ADA ! pic.twitter.com/27hLnsLe9W ‚Äî Good Morning Crypto (@AbsGMCrypto) June 30, 2025 The fund holds Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, XRP, and Cardano, with allocations of 79.9% to Bitcoin and 11.3% to Ethereum. SEC Chairman Paul Atkins has established a crypto task force to develop clear rules following years of ‚Äúregulation by enforcement‚Äù under Gary Gensler. March decisions on multiple altcoin ETFs were delayed until October , with the Commission citing a need for ‚Äúlonger periods‚Äù to consider proposed rule changes despite relatively high approval odds from analysts. The post SEC Approves Bitwise ETF, Then Immediately Reverses Decision Hours Later appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Watch Out: Jim Cramer Spoke About Bitcoin and Ethereum! Will it be Inverse Cramer Again?
body: Famous financial commentator Jim Cramer, in his statement on CNBC screens, recommended investors to buy Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH). Cramer considered these two crypto assets as a hedge against the rapidly rising national debt of the United States. ‚ÄúGet some protection for yourself against the $37.8 trillion debt,‚Äù Cramer said. ‚ÄúGet it for your children, for future generations. Anyone who thinks that way is the same way I do. I don't want this debt. I'm worried about my children.‚Äù Related News: Huge Ethereum (ETH) Withdrawals Are Taking Place - CEO Reveals the Identity of the Whale Behind Them Cramer, who said that the growing national debt of the United States could pose serious economic risks in the long run, conveyed his message clearly to the audience by saying, ‚ÄúBuy some Bitcoin, buy some ETH.‚Äù However, Jim Cramer's statements have been widely debated, as there's a widespread belief in the cryptocurrency market that the analyst's sentiments are contradictory. Cramer, previously a staunch Ethereum supporter, announced that he had sold all his ETH and has refrained from commenting on the cryptocurrency market. *This is not investment advice.
